description: Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. TongitsXtreme is played offline and is absolutely free! In this app version of the game of Tongits, you play against 2 computer players. The Artificial Intelligence (AI) engines could be average or a hustler, a conservative or an aggressive player! They will challenge your analytical skills to the point of driving you to madness, leaving you in amazement of how brilliant they are.GAME FEATURES:- User Experience feels like the real thing.- Intelligent opponents with multiple AI personalities- Multiple levels. Lower levels are easier. Get past level 7 to unlock more brilliant AIs.- You don't like cards dealt to you? No problem; just re-deal. (Only available in Level 7++).- Detailed Payment Scheme to guide you how much you are winning (or lossing).- Select your card back design- Interactive Messages to guide you throughout the game- Tokens and flags to remind player of previous round winner, last player to pick card from stack, and jackpot winner- Player's Money, Level, Rounds played, etc. backed-up even if App is updated - Swipe on the dumped card stack to see all the dumped cards- You don't have to remember how many cards are left on the deck; remaining card count is displayed on top of the deck.GOAL:Tong-its is a 3 player card game developed in the Northern Philippines. Your goal is to reduce the total value of your hand on your turn. You will win if you have done one of the ff : a) Eliminated all your cards ("Tong-its!") b) The lowest hand value at the end of the roundc) The lowest hand value in a Draw/FightTo reduce your hand value: a) Form and Post at least 1 Made b) Attach card/s to the Posted Mades Jackpot is won if you win two consecutive rounds.GAME FLOW:The round starts with the deal – 13 cards for the starting player/previous round winner and 12 cards for the other 2.If it’s your turn:-Start by picking from the Stack or the latest Dumped Card-Post the Made created if you picked the latest Dumped Card-You may or may not Post the other Made/s in your hand-Attach card/s to Posted Made/s-End your turn by Dumping a CardYou can initiate a “Draw” before picking from the Stack or Dumped Card if:-You have Posted at least 1 Made-No card was attached to your Posted Made/s from your previous turn to your current turnEnjoy!
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. TongitsXtreme is played offline and is absolutely free!


In this app version of the game of Tongits, you play against 2 computer players. The Artificial Intelligence (AI) engines could be average or a hustler, a conservative or an aggressive player! They will challenge your analytical skills to the point of driving you to madness, leaving you in amazement of how brilliant they are.


GAME FEATURES:
- User Experience feels like the real thing.
- Intelligent opponents with multiple AI personalities
- Multiple levels. Lower levels are easier. Get past level 7 to unlock more brilliant AIs.
- You don't like cards dealt to you? No problem; just re-deal. (Only available in Level 7++).
- Detailed Payment Scheme to guide you how much you are winning (or lossing).
- Select your card back design
- Interactive Messages to guide you throughout the game
- Tokens and flags to remind player of previous round winner, last player to pick card from stack, and jackpot winner
- Player's Money, Level, Rounds played, etc. backed-up even if App is updated
- Swipe on the dumped card stack to see all the dumped cards
- You don't have to remember how many cards are left on the deck; remaining card count is displayed on top of the deck.


GOAL:
Tong-its is a 3 player card game developed in the Northern Philippines. Your goal is to reduce the total value of your hand on your turn. You will win if you have done one of the ff :
a) Eliminated all your cards ("Tong-its!")
b) The lowest hand value at the end of the round
c) The lowest hand value in a Draw/Fight

To reduce your hand value:
a) Form and Post at least 1 Made
b) Attach card/s to the Posted Mades

Jackpot is won if you win two consecutive rounds.


GAME FLOW:
The round starts with the deal – 13 cards for the starting player/previous round winner and 12 cards for the other 2.

If it’s your turn:
-Start by picking from the Stack or the latest Dumped Card
-Post the Made created if you picked the latest Dumped Card
-You may or may not Post the other Made/s in your hand
-Attach card/s to Posted Made/s
-End your turn by Dumping a Card

You can initiate a “Draw” before picking from the Stack or Dumped Card if:
-You have Posted at least 1 Made
-No card was attached to your Posted Made/s from your previous turn to your current turn

Enjoy!
recentChanges: Minor enhancement.
summary: Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. Play free, play offline!
title: TongitsXtreme

comments: Short version, I'm not a big fan of puzzle games that have all of these moving graphics. They're more of a distraction to me. I wish you'd left in the settings so if we wanted the moving graphics we could have them. And, if not, the they'd be totally still and not distracting.  Make everyone happy that way. :,( Will be uninstalling this now.

This game is stupid. It froze my phone n i  had to buy a new one for 4589 dollars. Dont waste ur time downloading this. If u give good comments n ur planning to play this game for the rest of ur life...... Well, in 2 days u will need a new phone n u will end up buying a new one. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS GAME I REPEAT, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS GAME.
It's nice to have a game that just passes some time when I need a break from things. Very simple but I enjoy trying to beat my high score. And no internet required which I really like

I believe that we need a game that is simple, has no limit  of time to play, and you don't have to compare your score with others.  You just need to beat your own best score if you want. It's killing time in a portion that you chose.

Simple (which I like) puzzle game, yet gets really challenging in strategy thinking as it progresses, which is good if you want a challenge and aren't already mentally tired from work, etc. Easy on the eyes and has really pleasant nature theme on the edges with a bird song loop. Hardly noticed any ads, which was also really nice. One of the BEST free games to take your mind off things!
I would like to have an undo button when the  game pops an ad and the blocks drop and land in the wrong place. This jewel blocks is much easier to see to play than the wooden block games.
description: The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.
descriptionHTML: The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.
summary: A simple but addictive Puzzle game.
title: Block Puzzle Jewel

comments: I felt like this be could have so much potential! I thought that the different colours gave you the ability to collect more balls so not really sure what the point of the game is... no way to won or lose ... just click ... I like things with skill... I can handle the ads and would even pay to remove ads if the game have a point.. a purpose a win/lose sort of deal but it's not I don't think I will be keeping this game .. unless they add a little skill to it

This isn't a game. You just hold a button until it disappears and then hold another button... Really. And then there is an option to just have the buttons automatically hold themselves. Then the next level happens and there are new colors, but nothing else is different. Maybe good to keep your baby busy but I wouldn't condone that sort of thing

It's decent. I like the sounds it makes, and the colours look nice too. The forced ads I can't skip after 5 seconds is the annoying part. I get that you need ads, but come on man. I buy 3 upgrades and have to watch a full minute ad. It's like an ad simulator. Honestly if I wanted to play with balls, and watch ads I'd play with my own balls, and throw some ads on YouTube(this part is mostly for humour). Just so you know I'm not salty, annoyed yes, but not salty.

I like the game as it's one when you don't want to think but want to do something. It's very easy. However you watch more ads than you do play the game. So annoying I had to sit through a 1 minute cat chat advert without being able to skip it. Then a 10 second level then another 50 second unskipable ad so annoying

Ads are non skipable which is awful. Skippable ads are ones that pop up that you don't want usually. The full ads like on this game are only usually shown when you are getting a upgrade to a boost or something free etc. Terrible design as you can't win either

I love a stupid game, I really do, not everything has to be top tier strategy or reflex based or whatever  However this is the most boring clicker game ever. At least normal clickers have a theme or SOMETHING to pretend you're doing... Anything at all. Here, you don't even have that. No context, no theme, not even a change of shape or whatever  It's sad gaming has gone this low

comments: Homescapes is an awesome game, combining the relaxation (and frustration!) of match 3 games with the joy of renovating a fabulous mansion. Throw in the fascinating story line, lovable characters lovely music and stunning graphics (except the kitchen wallpaper lol), I'll be playing this for a long time! I'm working on the living room right now, getting close to level 800! Thank you Playrix!

Its a mind blowing game i cant help but to play this game my day seems not complete if i cant play the game specially when i cant pass the next level and the hardest part is the hard level the time are very fast when i am playing.i really love it and the freebies i can get everyday to boost my game.thank you creators and the makers the graphics and the animation is very realistic.

This is really exciting BUT the levels get way too hard!!! I want a game that you don't have to replay a level more than a couple times! That's when I stop playing. It's a game...it's supposed to be fun not rocket science!! It should relax you but when you're played a level 6 or 7 times and you get down to needing1move to win... yet again... you get stressed!! And the levels should be concentrated on tasks to fix the house not on things like starting a new day or talking to someone to fix something! PLEASE fix these things so it's fun! I like a challenge but this is ridiculous!!!

Just gave it 2 stars from 3 stars, everytime i use the kite booster it doesn't work and wastes it by flying away. Continued is my previous feedback. Love the game but it is ridiculous how we need stars to start a new day etc. It is difficult to get stars anyway. The lives go out fast because levels are hard. It take 900 coins just for 5 extra turns to finish the level but you get 45 or 50 coins only per level. You need to change this. Make it on the same level, give us atleast 1000 coins per level and let the level have enough stars per task rather than 1 star per level and requirement is 2 stars per task. Something to look into.
Getting green pieces gets extremely redundant. After 30 levels it's still the goal. Levels are near impossible unless you get lucky and things line up perfectly.
I enjoy this game more and more each day.  Is there a possibility to reduce the memory mb? It really takes a lot of storage and slow down my tablet. Thanks
description: Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door! Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home! The game features:● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house! Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu. Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/ Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!

Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com
developerAddress: The Digital Hub, Dublin 8, Ireland
recentChanges: Enjoy a new Homescapes update!
FLYING HIGH TOURNAMENT
• Make paper planes to finish in the top and win valuable pieces
• Get to know a new character: Jerry Doyle, a tournament planner
ALSO FEATURING
• A new element: Ice Bomb. Deactivate it before it freezes the adjacent tiles
• A new part of the storyline: create your dream garage and fix a retro car
• And many other improvements
summary: Homescapes
title: Homescapes

comments: I've love playing this game since I began. The main issue I have is that when you buy a new device to play on, none of your progress is saved and you have to starts back at the very beginning. I had more than 80% of the venues open, over 1.2M coins,  and nearly 100 gems. I bought a new phone and nothing was saved. That sucks! Can someone respond, find a way to save your progress so if you switch devices to play on,  you won't lose what you've gained and maybe return my earnings!

The game is awesome, as for the loyal players like myself your game isn't fair with the diamonds on the casino spin 😢 I play everyday at least 8hr or more and only receive 15 gems every two days or so. Please try to rectify the situation I have never received double or triple diamonds on a spin and I've been playing for a year or so. Why?????

UPDATE 4 the NEW BUILDINGS PLSSSsss? TY... Cant Wait. Hope its coming real real soon and REALLY hope theres MORE to come after. U HAVE A WINNER GAME HERE. i bought ALOT of games, & this one is on the top 5 list. Keep up the great work guys/gals. Awaiting the new buildings. lol.    :-)   TY

I have all this money and run through gems quick and it takes too long to obtain so I end up not playing for a while. A good way of doing this is through earnings that you collect from your restaurant. You can receive 1 gem

Game is very fun and addictive. But you shouldn't have to spend few hundred dollars to play through the game and play all of the restaurants. Yes you can earn gems for free but would take an insane amount of time with each restaurant requiring more and more for each upgrade as you go on.

description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

* 19 unique locations

descriptionHTML:
** Over 5 Million Downloads! **

Philippine Slam! brings the fun of 2v2, full-court basketball to your mobile devices. This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features ridiculous antics, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It’s basketball striped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.

Based from the players and teams of the Philippine Basketball Association, you can choose from real teams and players with real stats and abilities. Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!

FACTS
The Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.

Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.

FEATURES
* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game
* Create your own player and join your favorite team!
* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator
* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!
* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!
* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.
* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!
* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!
* No Fouls
* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.

** Barangay Ginebra
** Alaska Aces
** Magnolia Hotshots
** San Miguel Beermen
** Tropang TNT
** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters
** Meralco Bolts
** NLEX Road Warriors
** Phoenix Fuel Masters
** Global Port Batang Pier
** KIA Picanto
** Blackwater Elite

Guest Teams:

* Gilas Pilipinas
* 2017 All Star Luzon
* 2017 All Star Visayas
* 2017 All Star Mindanao

PERMISSIONS
* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for selecting photos when creating a player
* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for saving edited photos for custom player
* CAMERA: permissions for taking photos
* READ_PHONE_STATE: permissions for user statistics

We will continue to work and update the game with new rosters and more awesome features.

Like our facebook page to get updates and join contest
fb.com/pbaslamgame

And visit our websites at:
www.philippineslam.com
www.ranidagames.com

For comments and suggestions you can email us at
info[at]ranidagames.com
developerAddress: Macahora Building, Pacita Ave. San Pedro Laguna 4023 Philippines.

summary: The best free basketball game for your mobile devices!
title: Philippine Slam! 2018 - Basketball Slam!

comments: After the latest update, I've only gotten one set of daily quests which populated right after the update. After that, I haven't received any additional daily quest where I can win some gems. Why is that? Now the only way for me to earn more gems os through the free gems  (by watching adds), getting a high enough ranking in battlez, or buying them.

I think the new update is nice battlez is awesome and the good news is that my phone doesnt crashes anymore and when I played Inzanity it did'nt lag great rework but 1 question, WHY DID YOU REMOVE ULTIMATE BATTLE AND DEMONSTRATION MINI GAME THEMES TO EVERY WORLD?? Im sick of every level with just only themes

I think the new update is very cool. It adds some multiplayer into the game. When I heard of this new update I rushed to my phone and started playing. It turned out to be good I was happy and thought it would turn out well. Then after that I remembered pvz one. It's multiplayer mode was much better. One player would be plants and the other zombies. Why could they not have made that. It was such a good idea. I would personally play that mode more than this. But it's just my opinion. Thanks for reading.

Since last update it is very unstable and keeps crashing. Also every time i finish the last inzanity it crashes then once reloaded says expired so ive lost out. In fact im not that interested anymore. Im not a fan of battlez and it all seems geared to that now so had fun while it lasted.

I HATE YOUR UPDATE. Battlez mixed battle between players who bought plants with money with the players who don't is totally unfair. There are many players out there like me who play everyday collecting coins by coins and gems by gems patiently waiting for a good plant offer that we can buy with gems. Buying plants with money is not on the budget. I'm not angry. I'm sad. Because PVZ is always one of my top listed games. Now it's pathetic. Crashed. Unfair. Expensive.

description: Play the award-winning hit action-strategy adventure where you meet, greet, and defeat legions of hilarious zombies from the dawn of time, to the end of days. Amass an army of amazing plants, supercharge them with Plant Food, and devise the ultimate plan to protect your brain. 100 Million Downloads – This app has received more than 100 million overall downloads. Winner: Best Mobile Game at E3 – Game InformerWinner: Best Mobile Game 2013 – MashableWinner: Game of the Year 2013 – Slide to PlayDISCOVER HUNDREDS OF PLANTS AND ZOMBIESCollect your favorite lawn legends, like Sunflower and Peashooter, along with hundreds of other horticultural hotshots, including creative bloomers like Lava Guava and Laser Bean. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Jetpack Zombie and Mermaid Imp – you’ll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombie Chickens! GROW POWERFUL PLANTS  Earn Seed Packets as you play and use them to fuel your plants like never before. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up planting time, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!JOURNEY THROUGH SPACE AND TIME Battle across 11 crazy worlds, from Ancient Egypt to the Far Future, and beyond. With more than 300 levels, ultra-challenging endless zones, fun mini-games, and daily Piñata Party events, there’s always a new challenge to complete. Plus, ready your best defenses – Dr. Zomboss is waiting to take you on at the end of every world! EXPLORE MORE WITH THE TRAVEL LOGStumped about where to go next? Consult your Travel Log to embark on exciting Quests created just for you. Complete Scheduled Quests before time runs out, or take on a series of Epic Quests and earn special rewards.Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.

recentChanges: Battlez is here! Get ready for brand-new ways to play in our biggest update since launch. Now you can:
· Compete against other players to climb the leaderboard
· Battle relentless waves of zombies to get high scores
· Earn coins, piñatas, gauntlets, and other astounding league rewards
· Put your leveled-up Power Plants and zombie-bashing skills to the ultimate test
· Play all-new Daily Activities in the Travel Log
Thanks for playing!
summary: Defeat zombies throughout the ages in this fun, action-strategy adventure.
title: Plants vs. Zombies 2

comments: So, what makes this one of the best games made?  Let me start by saying the game play is fun.  Try to get the top medal each round. The game on its own is smooth and simple.  Graphic and physics are decent as well. But what makes this the best game?  Ads are not intrusive. You can simply back out of them without the "wait 30 seconds to continue."  I've actually watched ads in this game since they aren't forced. I keep them up because I wanted to.  This does not mean they aren't there or have little countdown timers, but you can simply hit the back button to close it. Next, you don't deal with "you didn't get a perfect score, want to try again? Buy more lives."  Exactly. NO IN APP PURCHASES. None!  Thank you!  Keep playing until your heart is content. Lose all you want and retry. They aren't looking for your money. Trust me, try it and you'll see. You also may find yourself more interested in the ads. I know it surprised me that I was. Every developer can learn from them!

Actually it is much easy and had very less features. It is not like a competitive game. In 2hours I have nearly unlocked 31 levels.  Make it a tough one....graphics is good but lots & lots of ads, very annoying ! And add scores there rather than medals

This is a very fun game, even though the screen freezes almost every time I go directly to the next level. I have to close it completely and then reopen it - Please fix this then I will rate it 5 stars.
Fun playing. Passes some idle time. Habit forming. How much more do I need to say before get something free? Lol...
Meh!!! It not what i expected I'd like to do the training but also the 1 on 1 competition. If any1 know of a pool app. Hit me up.
Great game....way too many ads. I would pay for an ad free version since the ads annoy me so much that I'm going to wind up uninstalling it.

update I wonder why game app like R.O.S and this moba AOV need a huge update. Please make this game using abit amount of size from before & please make game more balance. Player with low connection please dont make them didn't join any rank match or what.. they always make our game really bad

Better than ML. Honestly, I play all sorts of Moba (or any video game), but this one really is different.  This game has issues, no argument with that. But when you compare it to "Mobile Legends: Bang Bang", you really see the difference. This one has top-notch graphics that I can probably compare to VG or PC Mobas. This game has awesome gameplay as well. There are almost overpowered heroes, but there are always heroes that counter them. ML looks like sht compared to this game.  The only downside that I can see is that, the controls are kinda off. Probably with an update, they can fix that. Will give five stars once that happens.
description: Experience AOV - Arena of Valor, an epic new 5v5 MOBA by Garena!Garena 1st mobile MOBA, AOV, is now available in Philippines, Malaysia, and Singapore! Choose from a legion of unique heroes and become a legend in the Arena!Call on your teammates to join you in the jungle! Crush your enemies in classic 5v5 combat in real time! Draw first blood, carry your team, and conquer the Arena!Features:- Classic 5v5 MOBA, Perfected for Mobile -Battle in a familiar three-lane map filled with brushes, nooks and crannies that allow you to pull off amazing jukes. With intuitive controls tailored for mobile, you will dominate the battlefield in no time!- Play as any hero or legend -Explore and command a roster of over 30 heroes and counting. Enjoy a wide variety of playstyles as you lead the front lines as a tanky vanguard or infiltrate formations as an agile assassin.- The Ultimate MOBA Experience -All the familiar features that you have come to know and love, right at your fingertips! With 5v5, 3v3, 1v1, and a unique "Hook Wars" mode, AOV will provide you with endless replayability!- Fast Matchmaking & 15-Minute Matches -Enjoy the full MOBA experience in just 15 minutes! Enjoy fast matchmaking with players around the world and become a legend!- Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles -Enjoy fast-paced combat and forge friendships with players around the world. Interact with friends and guild buddies any time! Share the load, work together, and fight strategically. Team up with your friends in Tourney Mode and craft your own eSports legend.- Got What It Takes? Free to Play Forever -In AOV, it’s all about skill. We strive to create the most riveting and balanced gameplay, so you can turn the tide of battle and vie for glory no matter the odds. Win or lose, every action counts!

This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

Just some fancy loading screen and boom you're in the game without a chance to look at the controls. Plus your first mission is ruined by the tutorial at the worst places on the track.   Bad game knockoff. If you download this just delete it. This game is [EXPLICATIVE]

Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

The controls is very floaty like your car is late responding when tilted and i really like that this game is very fun and time wasting but it lacks car selection very small but i know it will add soon. And i thought the pic is real but it is not even the same on the game for its originality that all thanks

People have low requirements nowadays. This game doesn't deserve a 4.4 rating. It feels good as long as I stay in the menu (even with the weird japanese mascot) but once the game loads it gets horrible. The camera angles are terrible, the cars feel like toys in the overscaled world, the car's softshadow is terribly aligned and the physics simulation is just mediocre. The whole game is just a mediocre clone of Asphalt 8, I don't understand why people choose an inferior copy instead of the original one...

So many ad's, there back to back ad's. When I am finally able to select a race, guess what...another ad pops up and takes me to the play store to download it. I go back to the game and I gotta start all over again from the first screen. Ad's ad's ad's I was only able to play on the first day I downloaded it, after that..... Ad's ad's ad's                    "AD'S!!!".... But i did like the game when I played it

comments: Hasn't even been 10 seconds into the game before it shut down 🤣 - I thought it would be different for me as I have the S8+. Obviously NOT. The game started off very well and easy to navigate. Ease of controls. I will uninstall as there isn't much point keeping this game when it has already failed itself.

Let's be honest here. The concept was very creative and unique, but the game was very poorly designed. The slide is not smooth and   feels very unstable, I wasn't able to enjoy playing the game. The graphics are very low and the game itself is slow. Apart from that the idea was very well thought of but I feel you should have added more time and professionalism into the whole design, the game has potential.

One thing I find annoying is the adds! The game itself is addicting, but every time you die you have to sit through these long adds. I guess you could pay for the game without adds, but if your like me and you don't really like spending money at the app store, patience my friend... the game is worth it...

I really like this app but the the amount of ads are crazy! Wayyy too many. On a good note, the personalisation. I really like the different range of balls and the night time vortex, where everything stands out, and is all black. The trails are really neat too! Although the ball is quite sensitive when dodging around the obstacles. It is still great! I got a score of 104 on my second go! I'd definitely recommend this app! Also i have the samsung galaxy s4 so you can definitely 8nstall this if you have the same phone as me!😊

It is shuting down again and again, in starting that  heppen after 2-3 min then under 1 min and now I open and it shut down in few seconds. For my Moto x play runing 7.1.1  Love concept and game environment.  Control is fine.  Graphic are good.

It's hard to control and there are WAY too many ads. It lags so I'll be doing fine but it'll make me crash because it paused for a brief moment. If all this was improved, I'd love it. I love the concept of the game but everything else sucks.

comments: I liked the game so much. No! I love it, but it's just that I'm now on level 65 but I'm stucked since I only have few gems left and I needed to extend the time, and buy some customers which I find amazing just to save your energy and the stage but I also find it hard since I have already completed 3 stars from lower levels and why is it that I can't play the levels I have already completed? I would really suggest that lower levels would still be played just to be able to collect gems. I hope you can fix this issue though. I'm so loving this game and I'm getting addicted to it. I got stucked on level 65 on my two days of playing. Thank you

I love this game! So few games actually suck me in, but this game had me addicted right away. I play on my phone and laptop. Yes I have two different games at different levels lol. I love how upgrades are so easy and it isn't impossible to upgrade or move on. It gets challenging as you go up levels but it's so fun.

Moving on is hard on some levels because they are specifically designed for you to use gems and they are hard to come by. However, If you are patient enough you can eventually earn them. I enjoy that you don't have to drag the items to the customers. It's definitely an enjoyable and challenging game. I'm currently at a "coming soon" stage where I can no longer move ahead. I've been waiting a long time and do not want to wait forever. Please do an update soon!!!

Great game but some levels really hard I cant pasd this one level im on for days maybe update make it easier pass level I'm on I just did update...I hope so... love game anyways great game to.. identical cooking joy to map was a great game to but also hard get passed certain levels that game to n I can try play fast with my hands to still cant pass to not playing  cooking joy anymore going stick with this one see if game gets easier to

It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

Brilliant little time waster of a game.. yet.. once you start getting to the higher levels.. the less chance of earning gems and i aint noway paying for them.. last time I stupidly paid for gems on cooking fever..and got my account hacked into! Big lesson learnt! I do still play this alot tho so overall, definitely a good game. 👍
description: PREPARE 🔪, COOK 🕑and SERVE 🍕 delicious meals from all over the world 🌎 in Cooking Madness!  Become the master chef 👨‍🍳 you have always wanted to be! This year it’s this highly addictive time management game that’ll bring you the best digital cooking experience!  Get yourself in a real cooking craze. Cook like you’re a MAD CHEF in Cooking Madness! Did the cooking fever caught on and you can’t get enough of 🍨 cooking games? Then this is THE cooking game for you! You’ll be serving delicious dishes 🍩 to hungry customers in amazing restaurants in a ⏩ FAST pace. No challenge that can’t be beaten by you. Dash from restaurant to restaurant on this magical map. You will discover and unlock many places as you progress on your journey. 🌄 Get the restaurants back to business and attract more and more customers. Let the Cooking Madness begin! Practice your cooking techniques and management skills 🍽. Tap as fast as you can while keeping your eye on the time. Making dishes have never been so much fun and exciting! Try all the possible kitchen appliances 🍳 to improve your cooking abilities. Upgrade dishes and kitchenware for a better gaming experience!  Love a little bit of a thrill in your cooking game? Keep up with the rush hours, become better at time management 🛎. This cooking game offers endless fun levels with challenging missions set up in each level to give you that special experience.  What more FUN things brings this game? -       Cook & Travel  discover many different new restaurants 🍴-       Get Combos and Earn Huge Tips while showing off your cooking skills 💰-       Unlock New Restaurants by collecting enough key cards  🌮-       Upgrade your Kitchen and Level Up to become the famous Mad Chef! 💵-       Tap away in many fun levels 🍖-       Complete special missions and achievements to earn more🎁 -       And keep an eye on many more updates to come! 🔥 If you’re a fan of casual games 🎮 such as match 3 games, puzzle games or even building games. Then you should definitely give this a 🎢 go.  Put that Chef Hat on and get cooking! Download for free today and join the Cooking Madness! ♥️ Follow us on the official fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/cookingmadness.chef

description: The true king of thieves is back in business! Luckless burglar Bob is up to his old tricks again in Robbery Bob 2: Double Trouble.Sneak around security guards, past patrolling pensioners and evade cunning traps as you try to get your sticky mitts on as much loot as possible.Robbery Bob 2: Double Trouble Features:The man of steal is back! – and he’s landed himself in all sorts of trouble. Help Bob plan a wedding for a mobster’s daughter, stop Dr. Thievious’ devious plans and find out if aliens really do exist?Over 100 new levels of lootin’ fun! ­– What goodies will you loot as you sneak around the streets of Playa Mafioso, Shamville and Seagull Bay?Hide and Seek – Sneak around on tip-toe, hug walls to stay out of sight, make noise to distract guards and, if you’re caught red handed, get out of there quick!Old Bob, New Tricks – Use RC Cars, Teleportation Mines and tons of new gadgets to help Bob get out of a tight squeeze.Suited and looted – Sneak in style with a variety of outfits.Follow more of Bob’s antics on the Robbery Bob Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/RobberyBobVisit http://www.leveleight.se for assistance or inquiries.

comments: I would have gave a 5 but at times I would come in second and then get a trophy that says 3 place when clearly I finished 2nd and there has been times when I will come inblast at the finish line and then I would get the gold or silver trophy. Not sure why that happen. Also don't like how you have a truck and the grass and or sand will slow you down. Also wish there were more color options for your vehicles. Other than that its a fun and addicting game.

Love the game but cmon guys, how many times are the race ranking going to get messed up. Finish first... But says you were second, second but now I finish third, third but wait... Fourth. Not cool at all. Once or twice is whatever, but its happened at least a dozen times. Please fix this!!  Just dropped my rating again because its getting worse! Idk if its people cheating or what but this is ruining the game! The race rankings are a complete lottery, doesn't matter what place you come in because its gonna change... For the worse. Well it's ok but you are always underpowered I literally but the next 2!! Cars and I couldn't even get in 2nd place it's ridiculous I mean come on and I wasn't even up against real people it was bots. And the ramps using nitro on them is a deathtrap and the driving is Soo weird.

Add a friends tab to see if our friends our online as well as ability to send friend request. Clan tabs are very inconvenient so fix them as well plz. Over all a very good game.

Very misleading ad for it, showing two helmeted players leaning and "steering" with their tablets.  This falsely implies that steering is done by tilting tablet.  Truth: steering done by tapping arrows on screen, very hard to control.
description: SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.How to play:- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.Feature:- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit- 17 different types of cars- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...- New content coming soon!Tips:- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the bestThe most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. descriptionHTML:
SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.

How to play:
- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.

Feature:
- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit
- 17 different types of cars
- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want
- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires
- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory
- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart
- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...
- New content coming soon!

Tips:
- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up
- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others
- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the best

The most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!

We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. Stay tuned!

E-mail: skidstorm@cmcm.com
FB: @SkidStorm

Privacy Policies:
http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/privacy.html
http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/tos.html

title: SkidStorm—Multiplayer

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

For the non experts, let me tell you that 5his game cheats. I sat with a real chessboard to analyse why wasn't I  able to crack master level.   And what i observed was it didn't allow you to make actual moves when you show high levels of intell8gence. Sometimes it makes moves which are faulty. I think there is some mistakes in coding, perhaps deliberately made.  So not a fair play but a foul play.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
recentChanges: - added the save function
- updated difficulties of levels
- added description of stalemate
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: This game is sufficient. It's just a generic tower defense game. Honestly, it's too easy so couple that without much innovation and yeah, it's okay, but nothing to write home about. I already uninstalled this game because it doesn't stand out from any other tower defense game that I have ever played. Again, it's not a bad game, but it's not great either. Also, with a name like "game of warriors" how could this game not be just a bland clone?

Fun, entertaining defense RPG kind of game, with simple mechanics, but loads of fun nonetheless. Easy to play, progress and have fun without having to spend real cash too. That's always a giant plus for me, as many developers these days make their games either pay to win, or pay to progress ie, pay to have or get any sort of fun out of the game. A big thank you to the developers for not doing that with this game!  10/10 -Lots of fun, not pay for fun, lots and lots of hours of enjoyment, and nice graphics and sound design.

My account disappeared after I uninstalled the game because it wasnt letting me in and i now have to start from the beginning... Ive tried loading from the cloud but I receiving a message saying there is no previous save data... Is there a way to get my account back as I spent money on there?

Have just played for a short time and I find this game quite challenging & addictive. Very good gameplay and not $$ greedy. If you dont have $ you're still given the chance to raise coins to upgrade your troop. However, you need to have a lot of patience

The game is fun however the ads are a little too frequent. If the ads were cut back on some I would happily increase my review rating as other than that I'm really enjoying the game. Just keep in mind you will be watching or closing an ad after every wave to every other wave.

Pretty fun game. Good time killer. Not much of a challenge. The only downfall is an ad after almost every wave which can be very annoying. Most of the time you get a reward from watching. Loads of upgrades to choose from also. 4/5 for me 👌
description: Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!The warriors claim your name, lord!Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.Features:-  Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.-  +1500 defensive waves.-  4 Heroes to unlock.-  +100 territories to conquer.-  +30 soldiers to upgrade.-  +1000 building upgrades.-  4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).-  15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.
descriptionHTML:
Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.

The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.

Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.

The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!

The warriors claim your name, lord!

Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.

Features:

- Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.
- +1500 defensive waves.
- 4 Heroes to unlock.
- +100 territories to conquer.
- +30 soldiers to upgrade.
- +1000 building upgrades.
- 4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).
- 15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.

comments: Great time killer, pretty cheap to remove adds and get more continues. Devs are adding more stuff all the time. One thing, please please please let us select like 3 knives as favourites just because having just one or random is a bit lacking.  Nice simple game though.

It is a fun offline game that dose not have beautiful graphics but they appeal to the eyes the only complaint i have with the game is when it gives you the opportunity to continue your game by watching an ad you cant click the back button to automatically bring you back to the main menu. I hope you make the main menu button apear immediately or allow you to click your back button to go to the menu of the game but other than that AMAZING game!

I bought the app to get rid of the annoying ads. However, they are still there and nothing has changed. Emailed the developer and never got a reply. It's a fun game but customer support seems to be lacking. Will be requesting a refund.

I love the game, but you need to create more game modes. Yeah sure the bosses are nice and all but they get really boring after playing them over and over and over again. You need to liven up your game with different game modes/types to keep people coming back for more knife madness!

I was at stage 23 on monster, and stage 15 on pirate, the game started lagging, so I stopped playing for ONLY a day, and ALL my game data got deleted! I was back at stage 1 on all my challenges, and I had none of my knifes. I am very disappointed, I really liked this game until this happened. I hope ketchapp and estoty fixes this issue.

Game lags in the most critical moments, I've lost so many times just because of lag that happens unexpected. Throws the knife into the next knife even if there is plenty of space. Fix that and I will give for sure 5 star rating.

comments: Way too many ads. Every two games you get 30 seconds of advertisment. At one point an ad popped up during my game and made me lose. Played this for 5 minutes and uninstalled, dont even bother to download the game.

I always play games with music in the background and while playing this game my music would be constantly shut off because of the ads, I don't mind the ads themselves, just the fact that it constantly interrupts other sounds playing on the system is very irritating. Gave you 2 stars for a nice game, didn't play a lot though so couldn't tell you more.

I paid to get ad free.....STILL HAVE ADS! I like the game a lot. But if you have a button that gives you the option to pay for NO ADS, then you should get what you PAID for. The game itself is a lot of fun. I enjoy it a lot and its great time killer. But NOT getting what I PAID FOR does not make me a happy customer. This issue needs to be addressed and fixed.

This game is fun to play, however, I hate how on every Voodoo app that doesn't require Wi-Fi to play, the only way to stop being bombarded with 5000000000 ads, I have to turn my Wi-Fi and data off, otherwise the game play is ruined. This is a problem that really needs to be addressed. I read the reviews before downloading, so I know it's a consistent problem.  FYI, if you wanna play without all the ads, just turn your data and Wi-Fi off. It's a nuisance, but so are the ads.

Just listen to all of the reviewers and don't download this app! I got about thirty seconds of game-play, then an ad popped up. The ad lasted about a minute, and after that, my phone started glitching out.

Gravity is meant to work like gravity. The "alien" isn't the centre of gravity. It's meant to fall SIDEWAYS not directly AT YOU. I would understand if you were playing as a planet traversing through space, but you're not. This game is ass.

It's mindless fun and the soft gore while eating a human is fun. The underwater scenes are visually pleasant. I also like the feature that warps you to the North Pole once a day. The random vortexs that throw you into space are also a really fun feature.
description: Take control of a very Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage!Survive as long as possible by eating everything and everyone in your way! Explore underwater worlds filled with delicious and exotic creatures!Collect and evolve iconic sharks like the Great White, Hammerhead and Megalodon!In this action-packed aquatic adventure:• Unlock more than a dozen unique sharks and other fintastic creatures• Explore free-roaming worlds both above and below the waves• Enjoy jawsome 3D graphics and sound effects• Discover and devour mysterious creatures of the deep• Recruit Baby Sharks to boost your predatory powers• Equip awesome accessories like Lasers, Jetpacks and Top Hats!• Find and collect sunken Bonus Objects• Sink your teeth into loads of challenging missions• Activate Gold Rush to survive longer and score higher• Take part in regular in-game events to score limited edition prizes• Challenge your friends via Facebook social features• Attack with intuitive touch or tilt controls• Play offline wherever you are – no Wi-Fi needed!• Synchronize your game easily across Android devicesCompatible with Android 4.0 and above.This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gem and Coin currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Coins can also be collected in game without requiring purchase, or by watching video advertisements from the Treasure screen.This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase."Like on Facebook: www.facebook.com/HungrySharkEvolutionFollow on Twitter @HungrySharkEvoSubscribe on YouTube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondonNeed support? Have some feedback for us? Contact: support@fgol.co.uk"
descriptionHTML:
Take control of a very Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage!

Survive as long as possible by eating everything and everyone in your way!
Explore underwater worlds filled with delicious and exotic creatures!
Collect and evolve iconic sharks like the Great White, Hammerhead and Megalodon!

In this action-packed aquatic adventure:

• Unlock more than a dozen unique sharks and other fintastic creatures
• Explore free-roaming worlds both above and below the waves
• Enjoy jawsome 3D graphics and sound effects
• Discover and devour mysterious creatures of the deep
• Recruit Baby Sharks to boost your predatory powers
• Equip awesome accessories like Lasers, Jetpacks and Top Hats!
• Find and collect sunken Bonus Objects
• Sink your teeth into loads of challenging missions
• Activate Gold Rush to survive longer and score higher
• Take part in regular in-game events to score limited edition prizes
• Challenge your friends via Facebook social features
• Attack with intuitive touch or tilt controls
• Play offline wherever you are – no Wi-Fi needed!
• Synchronize your game easily across Android devices

Compatible with Android 4.0 and above.

This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gem and Coin currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Coins can also be collected in game without requiring purchase, or by watching video advertisements from the Treasure screen.
This game contains advertising.
Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

Follow on Twitter @HungrySharkEvo
Subscribe on YouTube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondon
Need support? Have some feedback for us? Contact: support@fgol.co.uk"

comments: Amazing game!! I have purchased 1 or 2 bikes already, I would even pay to get new bikes, but it is very expensive. Please consider lowering to prices or making better bikes more accessible. Ive been stuck on the same level for 5 weeks. I want to continue playing but im loosing intrest not being able to advance. Maybe you could trade your old bikes in to get something in return for a newer bike. Im sure you will never read this, but you do have something special here! Thanks

Very fun BMX pump game. Seen a few reviews say it's gets impossible after level 3 when it becomes pay to win. I don't agree I've just reached level 8 in a few hours. If you ride bikes off road and understand how to pump you'll love it

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

I loved this game for 3 days. Then it got to the point where I couldn't beat a level without upgrading my bike, but I couldn't upgrade my bike without spending real money. So disappointing. Don't waste your time if you don't want to spend real money!

The game is fun up until around the third level. After that it becomes near impossible to win any races without spending actual money to upgrade your bike. Had a lot of fun with it up until that point, but it's definitely not worth spending actual money on. Deleted the game after pay to win clearly became a necessity.

It was fun for a while - until it becomes impossible to beat any opponents with your current bike. The difficulty spikes around level 7 and the process of buying a new bike or upgrading your existing one becomes very frustrating, as you can't win any races to earn any money.

comments: Easily my favourite android game. Hits all the right spots. While Blitz followed the runner style coins model and see how much you can travel, I am glad that in this game they ditched that over-used android model. I appreciate there vision, it's a complete different game from Blitz. Various fictional cars and characters that seem original inspirations and charming in their own way. The tracks have a theme. Boss races under every championship. There is so much of soul in the game. And you can adjust resolution, add colour correction, adjust many other effects. Words don't do justice here nor does 5/5.

Amazing! I play this game daily and I never got bored. Just one thing: other drivers don't use special abilities which does not makes it challenging. Now since I have completed this game once, I would expect devs to add new levels and characters. I have an idea for a new character. Please contact me if I can help you

The controls take some getting used to. But for a Mario-Kart-like experience for mobile, this game gets my #1 rating. Feels more like Diddy Kong racing to be honest though. Can be played when you only have enough a few minutes, or grinded for awhile until you run out of tickets.

Imagine Mario Kart but on mobile with a few tweaks. That's what this game is and what a great game it is. So much variety and features that makes this game unique. Vector Unit  did an excellent job and this game deserves some credit for how great it is. I'm telling you, if you like Mario Kart, Crash Racing, Sonic All Stars or even Angry Birds Go, you're gonna love this game.

The game just restarted as if I never played it. Just went through the tutorial as a new player. I have been playing for months. Not sure what happened! Can't sync it with google games. I do know I was playing and mid game my phone battery died. I recharged it and went to the game and went default on me.

Second Beach Buggy game, this one you race opponents with some fun, but dirty tricks. A lot of reviews are unfair, just need to figure out strategies. Needs a few new tracks to update it a bit! I cleared it out 4 times & started over, love it! Played everyday for over a year, great fun. Needs a sequel, hope they didn't give up, there is no updates on their site. BBR-2, yea baby!

descriptionHTML:
Drive into an action-packed, surprise-filled world of off-road kart racing mayhem. Race against a field of rival drivers, each with unique personalities and special abilities. Build a collection of crazy powerups, like Dodgeball Frenzy, Fireball, and Oil Slick. Unlock and upgrade a variety of cars, from dune buggies to monster trucks. Test your skills in 6 different game modes on 15 imaginative 3D race tracks, against a pack of tropical-loving rivals with a serious case of road rage!

This is the official sequel Beach Buggy Blitz, the free driving game with over 30 Million players worldwide. Fast, furious, fun and FREE, Beach Buggy Racing is a kart-racing island adventure for all ages.


• • GAME FEATURES

EXCITING KART-RACING ACTION
Utilize your driving skills and a collection of creative powerups to fight your way to the finish line. It’s not just a great looking 3D racing game, it’s an epic battle with spectacular physics-based gameplay!

COOL CARS TO CUSTOMIZE
Use your winnings to collect and upgrade a garage full of unique cars, from monster trucks to muscle cars to lunar rovers!

TONS OF AMAZING POWERUPS
Beach Buggy Racing crushes other kart racers with over 25 totally unique Powerups ... and more Powerups are coming!

15 SPECTACULAR RACE TRACKS
Explore dinosaur-infested jungles, lava-spewing volcanoes, beautiful beaches, and mysterious swamps. Each unique race track is packed with hidden shortcuts and surprises.

COLLECT A TEAM OF RACERS
Recruit a team of drivers to play with, each with a unique special power like teleportation, flaming fire tracks, and confusion spells.

SPLIT SCREEN MULTIPLAYER
Race shoulder-to-shoulder with up to 4 friends on Android TV, or a TV-connected phone or tablet. (Requires In-App Purchase)

GOOGLE PLAY GAME SERVICES
Compete with your friends on Leaderboards, earn Achievements, back up your game to the cloud, and keep multiple devices in sync with your Google account.

PLAY THE WAY YOU WANT
Seamlessly switch between tilt steering, touch-screen, and USB/Bluetooth gamepad. Customize the 3D graphics settings to optimize your play experience.


• • CUSTOMER SUPPORT

If you encounter a problem running the game, please email us at support@vectorunit.com. Be sure to include the device you're using, Android OS version, and a detailed description of your problem.

We GUARANTEE if we can't fix a purchasing problem we'll give you a refund. But we can't help you if you just leave your problem in a review.

For fast support on most common issues please visit:
www.vectorunit.com/support


• • MORE INFORMATION • •

Be the first to hear about updates, download custom images, and interact with the developers!

Follow us on Google+ at www.vectorunit.com/+
Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/VectorUnit
Follow us on Twitter @vectorunit.
Visit our web page at www.vectorunit.com

description: Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech? Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
descriptionHTML:
Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.

The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.

As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.

The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.
Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.

This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!

PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/

description: One of the best free games in the world, MY TALKING TOM HAS BEEN THE NO.1 GAMES APP IN 135 COUNTRIES! Play now and see for yourself why the game’s so popular!  Adopt Talking Tom as your very own virtual pet and help him grow into a super cool fully-grown virtual cat. Dress him up in different outfits and fur colors, and choose from loads of accessories to make him look however you like! Whether you’re a kid or an adult, there’s no end to the cool fun you can have with Tom as your virtual pet! With this new update, TOM FINALLY GETS HIS DREAM OUTFIT – a fireman’s uniform! Now he can look cooler than ever before. And you can both have fun playing with his new interactive fire-breathing dragon helmet!Join the fun now and play for free!- PLAY POPULAR MINI-GAMES: Earn gold coins and have fun playing all kinds of games, from puzzle to action adventures! Rocket Fun, Tom Run, Flappy Tom, Happy Connect, Bubble Shooter, Rainbows, Brick Blast and more are all free to play! - NURTURE YOUR VERY OWN TOM: Name him, feed him his favorite foods, play with him, tuck him into bed, and watch him grow from a cute baby to a fun kid, and finally into a super cool fully-grown virtual cat.- TRAVEL AROUND THE WORLD: Collect your tickets and fly to meet other Toms. DOWNLOAD the latest word puzzle game – for FREE！
"Wordscapes 2018 Game Puzzle" is an exciting puzzle game for TRUE WORD geniuses! This modern word game combines the best of word searching and crosswords for tremendous brain challenging fun!
You’ll never experience a dull moment after you try this most addicting word puzzle game! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

HOW TO PLAY "Wordscapes 2018 "?
- Correct swipe the letters horizontally, vertically, diagonally, forwards or backwards to form a specific hidden word.
-Find as many words as possible to unlock levels and earn extra bonus coins.
-Fill in every block with a word! Earn coins when you discover star words.
- Have difficulty coming up with the word? You can use coins to buy a hint to help sovle the level.

When you get stuck at a difficult level:
- Click to "Hint" button to open a letter in letter box.
- Click "Shuffle" button to shuffle letters, then perhaps you find it easier to recognize the valid word.

• 4000 Levels
• Simple and Easy to play, challenging to master!
• Beautiful HD graphics
• Daily bonus rewards
• Support both Phones and Tablets.

comments: I enjoy this lifetime favorite with people worldwide, and Uno Dare is my most favorite mode. I understand it will be discontinued in June and I wish it wasn't so.    ...Hey Uno & Friends, could you please not ask me to rate an app I've already rated??? I was asked to read it again and then I came back to find I had made that specific request not to ask me to re-rate something. Your app needs to be reprogrammed so it knows if someone has rated it or not. (sigh)

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Greatest game ever~~¤mean it.  The Updated game even better.  Need to be easier to play with Friends that you JUST made ~~maybe REPLAY!!!  😬 😲 😠 😐 😭  Friends where are you? Great for tablets.   I am UNO happy . Happy New years  .Oh don't terminate the game unless you just have to, I well try finding something other to do. Nothing Good ever lasts anyway.   Thanks for reading.  UNO POWER.

LOVE! Please DO NOT end the game! This app is perfect all the way around. Best card game app ever. SOOO many people are gonna be upset if you take it down, so leave it up! These uno players are ready to rock this app! You will never not have people playing. It would be kind of cool if you could create your own avatar though.. & pick outfits and such. Not necessary, but a fun little quirk (:

Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.
