comments: Great potential, but there needs to be a way to earn free gems for the abundance of chest I have... Also there needs to be time to clean up the map once The main objective is completed and definently more chalice for chances to complete levels, I only have a certain amount of time to play so I need to fit it into my time, not yours.... Ok game but not a great game for the players, micro-transaction heavy and very little chances to complete the levels.

Really enjoy the game. Relaxing and addicting. However, i dont like the large amounts of lock chests taking up my camp space. I think the lock chests are too much of a push to get me to buy crystals. Chances of getting crystals seem slim and with the small amount of space available for other things, this is a down side for me. If i have to pay to open chests that i have been rewarded, why play? That might be  something that causes me to quit the game before too long.

When I first downloaded this game it was fun...now, all the dragons only have a stamina of 1 and now you need trophies to play levels. These trophies take f-o-r-e-v-e-r to accumulate. These things have made the game drag on way too long. And accomplishing any thing may also cost actual money now. I have read other reviews about the money system of this game and I will not be throwing my money down this drain.

Loved this game at the start. But since last update it has crashed on me several times. Today alone it has crashed on me 3 times. I lost all my camp progress each time and had to start again and of course each time is different because it is impossible to duplicate. Today I also lost my dragon gems and dragons I had created prior to crashes. There fore I lost my money spent. I also lost my daily chest which  contained 2 life trees and a super egg fragment.  I am very upset and dissatisfied now and regret spending money on this game that I loved prior to all the crashes.

Please remove The Challenges. The timer runs out too early on all of the challenges, all the way up to challenge 20. I have all the standard levels finished. I have been waiting for you to make new standard levels. The timer is cheating people in your challenges. There is no way they can be completed. I am not buying 50 gems to add 2 minutes. That's a waste of my money.

The game is great but customer service is non- existent. I bought the 30 day gem special that was supposed to come with an egg and fountain. Got the gems (so far)but not the extra items. Tried contacting customer support several times but following their M.O., they never respond.
description: Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching! In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:== Match Objects ==• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.== Tricky Puzzles ==• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
recentChanges: - NEW LEVELS! 11 New Levels in Cloud Land! This includes new cloud puzzles: find the right object to clear the clouds!
- Adjusted the Daily Chest to respawn after 23 hours instead of 24 hours, to help alleviate scheduling creep a bit.
- Added Turkish Language support
- Fixed the case where the camera could fly off in the opposite direction when panning, especially when playing in large levels or a bustling camp.
summary: Match everything in your world to create life and heal the land!
title: Merge Dragons!

comments: It's a nice game, with a great graphics and such but the auto-update for extra files it's kind of annoying. Is there anyway to turn it off? Because we have to waiting for it to be downloaded before can play again. Can we choose to update whenever we want?  Anyway, this is a really nice game and I've been playing it for a long time. Keep up the good work!

I love the game. There's nothing wrong with it because I feel like it's the old game that I grew up with. But what I hate is that the prices for packs, lp, sp and simoleons went high. The prices before was okay but now I don't think I will spend anymore for packs that give only like 5vip points. Such a fun game but aimes for large microtransactions.

I really enjoy this game, and love developing my Sim's homes and the world. Unfortunately, my game won't open. It hasn't for about a month now, even after this new update. It shows me the loading screen for five minutes, then crashes. It would be wonderful if there could be a fix for this.

Love love love it! This game is actually better than The Sims Mobile... 2 problems,, 1st. The Modern houses with second floor, so expensive😭! 2nd. The time it sometimes takes ages just for one activity!😐 but hey, everything else.. TOTALY AWSOME! 😍 thanks so much for creating this game. Cuz its so hard to download the sims 4 in a Mobile. 💕

This is actually cool and I really love this game. However, the expiration of most of the quest that i'm having are only 2 days to finish. I think it's unfair, and the materials needed are too expensive. Sims are busy on finishing tasks so they won't be able to go to work and earn. So I'm not totally enjoying the game.

When you get an event sometimes it only lasts for like 2 days which really isn't enough because some actions take 1 day. Please extend event times and don't give like 5 events at the same time. Also you should be able to log in other ways apart from Facebook because lots of people don't have Facebook. Please make other ways for us to login  so we can get more neighbours.

comments: This so freaking awesome, a woo hoo maker! I kept mumbling awesome, awesome, when i passed a car. And this is first time i'm very exited when i managed to finish a level, even after that, i repeat again till i can surpass it perfectly. Even i haven't sleep for 2 days, felt like an alien or zombie, etc. But this game cheers me up alot. Recommended ? Yes! Good job dev, just download it guys. Lu pasti hepi dah! Keren!

Wow... as I was writing this review it suddenly all disappeared as it said unfortunately traffic rider has stopped. Wow.. nice. I cannot even open the game without freezing up my tablet. Real nice. And tbh I love this game! On my phone it works..... 😥😣😈👹

Pretty cool..It was actually a little more than i expected.  The bikes are cool. They seem to be modeled after actual bikes, but perhaps didnt want to pay 4 the licensing to use actual manufacturer names.

Gave one star less because the missons lack mathematical accuracy There was this level to travel 8 kms in 130s and it was showing it an easy mission with a bike of top speed 172 kph 😂 The graphics and gameplay are superb I like the game
There are some idiot missions such as combo overheading. I would give this game 5 stars if not those missions.
I can't stop playing this!! The missions are really hard and thats what makes it fun! although i almost threw my phone twice. but this game is amazing! the graphic is good too!
description: Another masterpiece from the creators of Traffic Racer. This time, you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience, but also retaining the old school fun and simplicity.Traffic Rider takes the endless racing genre to a whole new level by adding a full career mode, first person view perspective, better graphics and real life recorded bike sounds. The essence of smooth arcade racing is still there but in the shell of the next generation. descriptionHTML:
Another masterpiece from the creators of Traffic Racer. This time, you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience, but also retaining the old school fun and simplicity.

Traffic Rider takes the endless racing genre to a whole new level by adding a full career mode, first person view perspective, better graphics and real life recorded bike sounds. The essence of smooth arcade racing is still there but in the shell of the next generation. Ride your bike in the endless highway roads overtaking the traffic, upgrade and buy new bikes to beat the missions in career mode.

Now it is time to hit the roads with a motorcycle!

FEATURES
- First person camera view
- 26 motorbikes to choose from
- Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes
- Detailed environments with day and night variations
- Career mode with 70+ missions
- Online leaderboards and 30+ achievements
- Support for 19 languages

TIPS
- The faster you ride, the more scores you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake traffic cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way gives extra score and cash
- Do wheelies to get extra score and cash

FOLLOW US
* http://facebook.com/trafficridergame
* http://twitter.com/traffic_rider

*** No Timers, No Fuel *** Just pure endless fun!

Traffic Rider will be updated regularly with your suggestions. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.

recentChanges: - Manual gear option
- End of holiday season
- Bug fixes and improvements
summary: The Next-Gen of Endless Motorbike Racing
title: Traffic Rider

comments: This game keeps crashing to the home screen without warning,same problem with Blossom blast saga.Problem started before few days ago,since I updated both games.This problem keeps happening with android kitkat. Can this problem be solved or should I deinstall all king games I have? I have no problem with games from other developers, so this is on you, not on me.

Have played this game virtually since it first started it's a great game but why do we haveto buy the gold bars we have earned throughout the games I have never spent a cent buying anything! Shouldn't most of the gold bars be awarded to us for being loyal gamers ☺

At level 558 I quit this game like 2=3 years ago... Now I don't even remember how to defeat spiders etc... Thought it would be fun to start over from scratch... But of course in these games not even a chance...  Great fun... NO

I enjoy the game BUT.... I payed £2.99 to open the piggy bank to collect my gold bars and when I tried to collect them again, I have a pop up telling me that I have to pay another £2.99 AGAIN to collect the 50 gold bars I have earned from completing each level! Nothing states that these are one off payments and that you have to pay everytime you want to collect your 50 gold bars. I never normally spend money on games and I most certainly will not waste any money on this game again! What an absolute rip off. When a gamer clicks on the piggy bank, I think that the notification should state that you have to pay the ridiculous amount of £2.99 everytime you want to collect your 50 gold bars.
Latest update keeps crashing especially when a level has been won and on the bonus. Crashes to hone screen then the level is lost  and had to be done again. Will restore 5 stars when fixed.
Payments for bricks does not respond with google play . Just says error occurred try later or wrong password. Im already logged in google play atc. I did not make any changes in my account.

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Will you join forces with the Farm Heroes and help to collect the Cropsies and save the day? Play through hundreds of levels of switching and matching farming fun to find out!
Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

comments: Really great gamplay, graphics, amazing controls which mind you are much more responsive than Sonic Dash or at least I think so, and this is the best concept I've ever seen. It's like Sonic Dash and a racing Sonic game had a baby. Best of all, this game captures the essence of Sonic in a brilliant way. Another thing I'd like to say is it's super balanced(besides Cream shes cheap as hell) but the fact is no character is better than the other cause they all have something unique about themselves.

The game is super choppy! I dont have a bad phone or Wi-Fi so I dont know the problem. If there was a mode like where you can reduce graphics that would be amazing. Besides that the rest is fine. Getting characters is easy, ads plays when after a match and/or if you want to double your rewards, and looks pretty nice.

I like it, really cool game, you never really know what's going to happen in a race. If you guys are making yet another character to race with, Im asking: can it please be Infinite, Big the 🐱, or our own custom character? Also, are you able to make different racing music in the game? I have a feeling that some people will get annoyed if the same "Lost Valley" song is being played over and over again.

I was enjoying the game but I started getting put against level 8's and 9's as a level 2.  Losing two races would take away 6 or 7  second place wins in a row, worth of progress.  I would lose 15-20 minutes worth of progress in two races. Wasting my time and effort.  Sometimes I swipe up to jump and my character just spin dashes instead, so my character just slams into an object or spins into a hole. Annoying.  After trying again and losing all gains in two losses, uninstalled.  Waste of time.

This game is really great and well polished. However, something needs to be done about the players with laggy connections. Most of the players with over 2000 points are all so laggy, that you can't tell where they are so you can't attack them. They are abusing the lag and need to be dealt with somehow.

Like the game but the latest update have mess up the gameplay with alot of lag. It keep sticking or kicking me out of the gameplay. Before the uodate. I had no issues and it was great. Please look into this

comments: Here I am like many others, unable to get into my game after update. Was level 53, recently earned the Chinese dog and had lots of upgrades to my farm. I would have been excited about the upcoming birthday event if I could access my game. Fix soon or I will delete this and all other zynga games I funnel my hard working money into

Great game, love achieving all the quests, also love the show animals, I wish I could do more than one with a partner though. I wish that during an update that it wouldn't stop the game for the players, showing grassy area with no coins or keys and level 1, so I could continue to play. But I know I just have to leave it for a while and wait till the update is finished, which is hard because it is so addictive. Some people need to remember though that this is a free game.

Liked this game until now. I recieved some keys from the game. I used them then they said they had had some technical difficulties and some players should not have received them then promptly took my remaining keys off me!  This was they're mistake not mine. I find this churlish and ridiculous. It's put me right off the game!

Since Jan this game has gone to hell in a hand basket. Every update I have to fight to get stuff back they y'all took from my game. This game use to be fun, now I don't care if I play it or not. Y'all only care a out the people who spend money on your game, not the loyal ones that's been playing since it went mobile. I'm very disappointed!!

I just started playing this game and was really liking it. In one day I made it to level 15 and had made a purchase using real money. The app froze and I tried everything is fix it but it erased my whole farm and made me start over. I am soooooo mad!!!! And I'm mad I spent money and lost everything. Really not impressed at all

When I first got it it worked fine. (Yesterday). Now every time I get on it'll load but will freeze and not let me do ANYTHING AT ALL. I've tried everything from closing the app to restarting my phone. Please fix it because I really like the game.
description: **App Store Best of 2014**Escape to the world of farming, friends and fun! Go on farm adventures to collect rare goods and craft new recipes. Raise animals and grow your farm with friends. Join a farm Co-Op to trade and share or play on your own in Anonymous Mode. You can play FarmVille anytime, anywhere… even when not connected to the internet. Best of all, the world’s most popular farming game is free to play! ** ”FarmVille is back and this time, it’s portable!” – TIME **** “”Officially not just for Facebook anymore”” – Los Angeles Times **** “” They may have built the best FarmVille game of the series”” – Kotaku **-  CRAFT a variety of baked gourmet goods like classic country apple pies- HARVEST farm fresh crops of your favorite fruits and vegetables- CUSTOMIZE your own farm for charming country living- COLLECT hidden and rare items as you discover a new coastal farm- NURTURE and raise a wide variety of adorable animals like your very own farm dog- EXPLORE a new FarmVille story filled with special farm adventures- BUILD a lush family farm by the coast so all your friends can visit- FISH with your fellow farmers and sell your catch at Pike’s Landing- GARDEN by the beautiful blue ocean as you decorate your farm with flowers and fresh produce- TRADE and chat with friends or play anonymously with people from all over the world- ESCAPE to the coast then connect to your Facebook farm to send free water- EARN daily rewards with the Mystery Chest and take a spin at the Prize Wheel”Additional information:•        The game is free to play; however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $199.99 USD. •        Use of this application is governed by Zynga’s Terms of Service, found at www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. •        For information about how Zynga uses personal data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

comments: Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

description: Think, search, swipe and connect all letters into words!Looking for an interesting word game with endless fun?Desiring to play thousands of puzzles of words!Enjoy the happy game moment with family and friends?Then Wordsdom will be your best choice ever!What are you waiting for? Just click and start to play! 2000+ levels are waiting for you to challenge! It’s easy to learn, but hard to master! Show your smartness!Play Wordsdom, the addictive word puzzle game, for once and you can’t stop playing it! More importantly, Wordsdom is a free game and you can play it whenever you like, wherever you are. The fun is ready for you anytime!How to play:• Easy to learn. Xeleb creates sequel to successful “FPJ’s ANG PROBINSYANO” mobile game series under partnership with ABS-CBN

Manila, Philippines – Coming from the trending success of the first “FPJ’s Ang Probinsyano” mobile game, which has garnered over 1M downloads, Xeleb continues with its strong partnership with local TV network ABS-CBN to release a much-awaited sequel – “FPJ’s ANG PROBINSYANO: RESCUE MISSION”.

SPO2 Ricardo “Cardo” Dalisay (Coco Martin) returns in a level-based, action cover-and-shoot game that has loyal fans of the Kapamilya top-rating prime-time series ducking from bullets and beating the baddies.

The special mission? To help Cardo defeat evil enemy syndicates and rescue innocent civilians that are caught in the middle of the dangerous crossfire. Exciting rewards and mystery boxes await those who successfully complete missions, game levels, and additional tasks!

“FPJ’s Ang Probinsyano: Rescue Mission” is available on Google Play. For more information, please visit www.xeleb.com or @XelebGames on social media.


ABOUT XELEB

Xeleb Technologies Inc. or "Xeleb", under the Xurpas group of companies, is the country’s first technology company focused on the creation and development of celebrity-branded and themed digital products and services – specifically mobile games, mobile consumer content, and platforms. Xeleb’s current portfolio features the country’s biggest stars: Anne Curtis-Smith, Alejandro “Kuya Kim” Atienza, Isabelle Daza, and Erwan Jean Heussaff. To know more about Xeleb, its products, and services, please visit www.xeleb.com or @XelebGames on social media.

Originally founded to provide mobile digital content to telecommunications operators, the company currently offers mobile consumer products including smartphone games, mobile ads, mobile platforms, and enterprise solutions. It has offices in Indonesia, Singapore, Vietnam, and India. To know more about Xurpas Inc., its products, and services, please visit www.xurpas.com.

description: Do you like word search? This letter puzzle game will surprise you. Edujoy’s word search game is easy to play, ideal for hours of fun entertainment while training your brain. It is suitable for both adults and children, resulting in an educational and enriching experience as you play. It has different levels of difficulty, making it perfect for anyone who is on the lookout for words on a board.Easy: Perfect for little kids. The board is 6x6 so it's easy to find the words and solve the puzzle. In addition, the clue system helps you find a new word when the child is stuck.Medium: The board is built 9x9. As you move up in the game the level becomes much more difficult and challenging than the last.Hard: The board is 12x12 and each game is harder. This level is made for players who are looking to test and train their brain with a classic puzzle game.Extreme: Only the bravest may face this level! A difficult feat for those up for the challenge. Do you think you'll be able to beat it?Our app is a classic mental game for all ages. Find the hidden words! 5 levels of difficulty for all ages - easy for children all the way up to extreme for adults.It is also available in several languages, which ​​makes it ideal for learning new vocabulary in other languages. If you are learning: Spanish, English, German, Portuguese, French, Italian, Polish, Turkish… this is the game for you!You will never want to play another word search game and end up referring it to your friends! Every time you play it's a new experience due to our generating system that creates a brand new, random puzzle game. By doing this, it makes it challenging for you every time and allows us to keep you wanting to solve the puzzle. So, you will never get bored!The word search boards are created with many fundamental topics: food, animals, cities, countries, transport, home, colors, sports… Are you ready to solve hundreds of fun-filled puzzles?In addition, the game is integrated with game services making it a social experience with your friends and family. This system allows you to compare your skills and results with others and millions of people around the world. Rankings and achievements included.The classification is based on the time needed to complete a level. So the faster you are, the higher you rank.Through your achievements, you can track your progress and know how you are doing as time passes by. Unlock all the achievements and eventually you'll become the master of puzzles.Thanks to you, It’s very important for us that you share your opinions so we can improve based off the feedback we receive. If you have any questions or suggestions please contact us on our site or through our profiles on social media:Twitter: twitter.com/edujoygamesFacebook: facebook.com/edujoysl
descriptionHTML:
Do you like word search? This letter puzzle game will surprise you. Edujoy’s word search game is easy to play, ideal for hours of fun entertainment while training your brain. It is suitable for both adults and children, resulting in an educational and enriching experience as you play. It has different levels of difficulty, making it perfect for anyone who is on the lookout for words on a board.

Easy: Perfect for little kids. The board is 6x6 so it's easy to find the words and solve the puzzle. In addition, the clue system helps you find a new word when the child is stuck.
Medium: The board is built 9x9. As you move up in the game the level becomes much more difficult and challenging than the last.
Hard: The board is 12x12 and each game is harder. This level is made for players who are looking to test and train their brain with a classic puzzle game.
Extreme: Only the bravest may face this level! A difficult feat for those up for the challenge. Do you think you'll be able to beat it?

Our app is a classic mental game for all ages. Find the hidden words! 5 levels of difficulty for all ages - easy for children all the way up to extreme for adults.
It is also available in several languages, which ​​makes it ideal for learning new vocabulary in other languages. If you are learning: Spanish, English, German, Portuguese, French, Italian, Polish, Turkish… this is the game for you!
You will never want to play another word search game and end up referring it to your friends! Every time you play it's a new experience due to our generating system that creates a brand new, random puzzle game. By doing this, it makes it challenging for you every time and allows us to keep you wanting to solve the puzzle. So, you will never get bored!
The word search boards are created with many fundamental topics: food, animals, cities, countries, transport, home, colors, sports… Are you ready to solve hundreds of fun-filled puzzles?
In addition, the game is integrated with game services making it a social experience with your friends and family. This system allows you to compare your skills and results with others and millions of people around the world. Rankings and achievements included.
The classification is based on the time needed to complete a level. So the faster you are, the higher you rank.
Through your achievements, you can track your progress and know how you are doing as time passes by. Unlock all the achievements and eventually you'll become the master of puzzles.

Thanks to you, It’s very important for us that you share your opinions so we can improve based off the feedback we receive. If you have any questions or suggestions please contact us on our site or through our profiles on social media:

Twitter: twitter.com/edujoygames
Facebook: facebook.com/edujoysl

descriptionHTML:
You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.

Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.

Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.

recentChanges: Love is in the air! Our friends have discovered even more Dumb Ways to Die in three new mini-games!
HEARTS AND CRAFTS – Calamity is working her heart out on a set of crafts. Keep her hand steady to make sure she doesn’t get too cut up.

comments: Great game This is a wonderful game, with great gameplay, amazing aesthetics and highly addictive. Totally worth the $2 for the premium version. I do have one problem though: even though I am pretty decent at the game, Google Play won't give me any achievements even though I'm sure I have earned some. It won't even let me open achievements or leaderboard pages. Is anybody else having this issue?

I came across this app while I was browsing for more games. Looks very well designed and I've decided to make room for this app. The very first time I played this game my mind was literally blown. Awesome music, fantastic design/graphics and very creative gameplay. It gave me a very good first impression that within 30 minutes into the game I've upgraded to premium. The different game modes accomodate various type of players. The challenges are reasonable. Literally every aspect of this game is a success. The premium upgrade is worth every cent. Who need ads if you can give a very good first impression. A simple yet sophisticated game. Very well done indeed, a must for time killer!

There are so many good things to list about this game. First, the graphics are extordinarily beautiful. And how much this game can relax you is AMAZING! When I play this, I swear my stress is gone. This game is never stressful. I find it amazing how satisfying this game is. I also love how realistic this game it is. The veiw and echoing is what really make up this game. Every sound is perfect for the setting. You need to download this NOW!

Really fun and addicting! The first time i saw this app was when my dad told me about this game, he said that it was very good. Literally the first 10 minutes i played this game my mind was blown and i beacame addicted. Around 2 years later(now) i found this game again and instantly installed it. I love this game and I have played it for a long time. The graphics and music are amazing. This a really good game and you should install it! Who could think that glass could be so fun. However I think this game would be better if some of the thing you have to pay for would be for free.

Great game, but premium is almost a requirement. The game itself is great, with an uber-cool, never-seen-before concept of smashing glass with metal balls in mysterious dimensions. The only problem is that getting premium is almost a requirement if you want to do well in the game. You can't continue the level once you die without paying. I would rate this game five stars if it weren't for this.

So fun Great graphics and its super fun and addictive especially if you like beating your own score. I gave 4 stars because I paid the 2 dollars for the full version but I find that it doesn't save where I'm at very well... Like if I leave the game and come back to it the last level I completed won't be saved. Other than that its really awesome and challenging. Hope I can get past level 8!
description: Take a surreal journey through an otherworldly dimension, move in harmony with sound and music and smash everything in your path! This experience requires focus, concentration, and timing to not only travel as far as you can, but also break the beautiful glass objects that stand in your way.* Smash your way through a beautiful futuristic dimension, smashing obstacles and targets in your path and experiencing the best destruction physics on mobile devices.* Musically synchronized gameplay: music and audio effects change to suit each stage, obstacles move to each new tune.* Over 50 different rooms with 11 different graphic styles, and realistic glass-breaking mechanics in every stage.Smash Hit is playable at no cost and free from ads. An optional premium upgrade is available through a one-time in-app purchase that will enable new game modes, cloud save across multiple devices, detailed statistics and the ability to continue from checkpoints.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Pool Billiards Pro game! How about a nice little game of pool? This is the No.1 Pool game in Android market and it's totally FREE.

Game Features:
1. Realistic 3D ball animation
2. Touch control for moving the stick
3. 8 Ball Pool and 9 Ball Pool
4. Single Player Mode:
4.1 VS Mode: Player vs. Computer/Player (with rules)
4.2 Time Mode - Straight Pool Game (no rules)
- Challenge (2 minutes time limit with high score record)
- Practice (no time limit but no high score record)
5. Play Online Mode (with rules):
Compete 1-on-1 with real players all over the world. Win the matches and take the chips at stake. You can use the chips to customize and upgrade your cues or enter into higher ranked matches!
6. Arcade Mode: 180+ Challenging Levels (no rules)

How to play:
1) VS Mode: Player vs. Computer/Player (with rules)
Play against the computer AI/Player with standard 8 ball rules or 9 ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike. Touch and hold at any point to move the cue-ball and tap to confirm for Free-ball.

2) Time Mode (no rules)
The object of the game is to pocket your set of assigned balls. The more balls sink the higher scores you get. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike.
The initial time limit of Challenge Mode is 2 minutes but once you sink a ball you will get additional time. As all the balls have been cleared, the pool will create a new group of balls to keep the game going on. Also you can play the Practice Mode which has no time limit but no high score record.

3) Arcade Mode (New and no rules)
You need to pocket all the balls on the table within the given number of cues. There is no time limit and rules for this mode but watch out you have only limited number of cues.

Rack em!

Notes: The permissions required in this game is only used for online leader board. Thanks.
developerAddress: 5th Floor Harbour Centre, George Town, Grand Cayman KY1-1107, Cayman Islands
recentChanges: v3.9: Fixed some crash bugs in the last update. Thanks.
summary: Welcome to the Pool Billiards Pro game! How about a nice little game of pool?
title: Pool Billiards Pro

descriptionHTML:
Epic 2017 Mobile Masterpiece - 3D MMORPG Mobile Game, Honor Against Darkness!

Leap through time and jump into a mysterious fantasy world! All sorts of real-time PvP battles and action are found in Honor Against Darkness. No matter if you wish to fight alone or team up with your allies, you’ll enjoy some of the most intense and challenging battles around!

【GAME FEATURES】
Brilliant 3D graphics and special effects
Built on Unity 3D, Honor Against Darkness displays some of the latest and graphics on mobile. You’ll be pleasantly surprised by the beauty of the various characters, pets, mounts and maps available.
Real-time PvP battles at all and any times
PvP is open game on all maps. Choose 1 vs. 1, team vs. team, or guild vs guild. Fight for honor and team up with friends and guild mates to challenge the top players on the server. If you’ve got enough willpower, anything is possible in this world.
Trade freely and buy or sell your equipment
Featuring an auction house, Honor Against Darkness allows you to auction off your loot – and for Diamonds! You’ll be able to sell unused or extra gear from monster drops or quest rewards for much needed in-game currency.
Level up with no limitations
With an offline auto-battle system, you’re able to level up even while you’re busy or offline! You’ll never be left behind, so rise up the ranks and become the top Honor Against Darkness warrior!

【COMMUNITY】
Visit our official Facebook page and forum for the latest news and announcements: )
Official Facebook -- https://www.facebook.com/HonorAgainstDarkness/
Official Website -- http://had.rastargames.com

comments: Well I think you need better graphics and I don't like how it is slow when you turn. Plus it has TOO MANY ADS! I just started playing this game! The pictures showing the terrains is probably copied off of MCPE's pictures (I am not saying it is! But it might be). I really like this game I really do but there needs to be some changes. People aren't going to like this game if there isn't some changes. I just read a comment saying this game is "gay". That was incredibly rude. People shouldn't call it "dumb" or "gay" just because this game needs better graphics or it has to many ads. Does anyone even know the definition of "gay"? There is two meanings for it but they both mean your happy! Stop calling the game names! It is not necessary to!

I love this game, it's sooooo fun but my only problem is the ads. It was fine when I first downloaded it, there were no ads but after I upgrade the game, all of a sudden there's ads every second. If you can get rid of the ads, I would greatly appreciate it

There's so many things wrong with this I don't even know where to start. First off your in a confined space and if you go so far you just hit a blue wall. If in was infinitely generated and you could go farther it might be better. Second its kind of slow when moving. Third since the whole confined space thing you have each different biome all pushed together so when you walk two steps your in a different biome and its small. So you extremely need to make it better.

So, the game itself is incredibly enjoyable and fun. Sometimes the controls get me here and there, but I'm sure, with time, I'd get use to it. The thing is, THERE IS NO TIME. Literally every minute, I get a thirty second ad. I'm just here building my home and making foundation when all of a sudden, an ad pops up. I say, "oh okay, it's just one, whatevs." WRONG. It is now ten, just over the past 5 minutes. This game has serious potential, if only it'd let us play the game and cut out the ads. I'm spending more time watching ads rather than using time to efficiently play the game. It irks me, so I uninstalled the ap. It really is a good game, just lower the ads from 2 per minute, kay?

descriptionHTML:
※The Next Generation Strategy MMO "Kingdom Craft" has now available in Philippine!

Players from other regions can pre-register now to receive Super-Powered rewards!

The detailed graphics and innovative game modes are unlike any real time MMO strategy game you've ever played! Collect and train historical heroes from three kingdoms to participate in massive online PVP battles, where the best strategist will reign supreme;
Or interact with in-game female streamers to get all your questions answered! With the world at your fingertips, will you become a benevolent ruler respected by his people, or will you become a conqueror that unifies the whole Kingdom?



---Features---

# An archaistic masterpiece

The design team focused on recreating both the architecture and the atmosphere from ancient times, so you will be able to enjoy the amazing scenery and beautiful music as they roam the land.

# Interact with female influencers inside the game

With the game's innovative in-game broadcasting system, you will be able to chat, ask questions and send gifts to our female streamers when playing the game!

# Build alliances with players worldwide

Whether you're the military commander, the adviser, the diplomat or the pacifist, there is a spot for you. Do what you do best and help your Alliance dominate the land!

# Collect and command Super-powered heroes

Zhang Fei, Zhao Yun, Zhuge Liang, Cao Cao...recruit these Three Kingdom heroes and command them to achieve greatness!

# Conquer kingdoms & fight against other lords with tactical real-time MMO battle action

Even though you might not have met them, your allies are your greatest assets. Join them and help them repel the enemies! Those who resist must perish as your Alliance moves closer to the throne!

# Open Beta Launch Events are now available

Log in for 8 days total to get 5-Star XiaoQiao, purchase for the first time to get legendary ZhangFei, and legendary CaoCao from store specials!


Download Kingdom Craft now to explore the three kingdom stories and take control of the realm in this next generation MMO PVP war!

-----

Are you having problems? Send an email to support@highmorale.com to contact us.

Get connected with us and players worldwide!

• Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialKingdomCraft/
developerAddress: Far East Finance Ctr
recentChanges: # Open beta launch events & rewards now available
# Log in for 8 days to get 5-Star XiaoQiao
# Purchase for the first time to get legendary ZhangFei
#Legendary hero CaoCao available in store specials
# Interact with female influencers inside the game
summary: A next-generation real-time combat and strategy MMO mobile game.
title: Kingdom Craft

description: Launch the escape plan step by step and break out to prove innocence of yourself in #1 prison themed open world escape game!You are sent to death row due to a conspiracy and the only way to save yourself is to break out the prison from inside. You are sent to death row due to a conspiracy and the only way to save yourself is to break out the prison from inside. Befriends with other inmates to get help, fight with other crime gangsters to gain respect, or just dig an escape tunnel underneath the prison. It’s all you call!

comments: Loved the game. Hell, I even dropped $30 to get the big gun. About a week after that, the game started freezing and closing out. I submitted an email to them and they SAID they would help. I asked them if I uninstalled and then cleanly reinstalled it, would I have my gun that I PAID FOR. That was the last of the conversation. Would have recommended this to anyone until now. For 3 weeks I have tried to reach them and have gotten nothing. So, HELL NO, I would NOT recommend this to anyone.

Game is fun. A lot of oppurtunity to get gems if you have patience.. gameplay is really good. However too many ads.. if you offer the oppurtunity for people to watch ads to get gems then why throw in all the extra random ads that we are forced to watch? Also i sometiimes get ads appear that you cant get rid of unless you close the game and reopen it. For trhis i give it one star.. get rid of the ads and ill give it 5

I think that when I deserve a reward for doing one of the free gem missions, like downloading a game and starting it.. that I should get my gems. Also I completed a daily task and did not receive my grenade. But other than that I love this game.. just needs those things to work! And maybe if I could get those things it would be nice!

I have did a lot of promotions to get free gems and didn't get any! I think it's wrong that I have wasted my time on the false advertising for gems. If y'all can't honor the time people put into to get the gems... Then y'all need to take it down! Other than that, the game is fun

Great game, but the offer wall with the gems sucks. I paid for an offer and did not receive my gems. Sent email to the app producer and they suggested i contact other people. The problem has still not been corrected. So beware of offer wall. Dont waste your money!

Usually don't"pay" for games. Made a $9.99 in game purchase, went through. Started playing gun and upgrades along with remaining gems are now gone, after only two minutes of playing!! RIP off!! Took money and screwed me!! Will contact my bank if not remedy. Theft of service!! UPDATE 3/8/18 STILL NO REMEDY FROM DEVELOPER! WILL STEAL YOUR MONEY A D GAME GLITCHES AND SHUTS OFF TAKING ANY PROGRESS! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!! UPDATE 3/18/18  STILL NO WORD OR REMEDY FROM DEVELOPER!!! SCAM!!!!!
description: Featured multiple times amongst Google Play’s recommended shooting gamesA virus has brought about the zombie apocalypse, the war against zombie has broken out and people are in immediate danger of a gory death. As a survivor and zombie hunter, it’s up to you to make the streets your battlefield and shoot your way through numerous challenging levels. ZF3D is an all new zombie shooting game with excellent graphics, unmissable if you are a fan of thrillers or horror games.Keep your finger on the trigger as you try to ensure your survival in a virus ravaged world. Upgrade your skills as a survivor and zombie terminator in frontline fighting, enhance your arsenal of weapons, such as sniper guns shotgun and rifles.Fight for survival through multiple cool game modes. Test your skills in sniper missions and lead survivors to safety in support mission. Come and experience a truly immersive 3D world and excellent graphics in this zombie action game! The zombie apocalypse may have happened, but that’s no reason to just give up. Take on the role of a zombie terminator against the undead targets and shoot your way to victory over this zombie purgatory of more than 120 levels. If you’re a FPS and shooting game fan, then ZF3D is your next adventure!Stunning 3D GraphicsA horde of zombies are upon you. Will you escape or shoot your way out? ZF3 is an amazing, fully realized 3D zombie apocalypse game completed with fantastic undead animations and graphics, it is the next level in smartphone thriller and shooting games.Awesome Sound & MusicSounds effects and music will take you into the world of the first person shooter. Feel as if you were there and experiencing a real zombie war.Numerous different undead targetsChallenge yourself against some of the toughest undead on the frontline battlefield and shoot every targets in the head. A good zombie terminator won’t waste a single bullet. Innovative Gameplay ModeAcross numerous battlefields, ramp up the action with 5 boss battles, 60 sniper missions, and 2 DLG map, many support levels and regular special events.Multiple Scenes DesignFrom urban area to the industrial zone, under the subway or on the tropical islands, even to the latest snowfield are all your battlefield, so easy to become addicted to this adventure!Cool Arsenal of WeaponsIt wouldn’t be a cool shooting game without an impressive arsenal. Choose from more than 30 different guns with which to head into combat. Blast your enemies with an MP5, AK47, Desert Eagle, FN SCAR, HK 416, and many more shotguns and rifles! Let alone various props like adrenaline and grenade. Get your trigger finger ready, the undead must be eliminated.Weapon Upgrade SystemUpgrade weapons in your arsenal, increase their power, range, firing rate and more to take down stronger zombies. You can even equip them with awesome decals! Upgrade your firepower and survive the zombie apocalypse!Special EventsTake part in special in-game combat and sniper missions to win gold, coins and other prizes!Take part in the fight to rebuild cities and civilizations following the outbreak of the virus in the latest action packed horror game FPS from FT Games!
descriptionHTML:
Featured multiple times amongst Google Play’s recommended shooting games
A virus has brought about the zombie apocalypse, the war against zombie has broken out and people are in immediate danger of a gory death. As a survivor and zombie hunter, it’s up to you to make the streets your battlefield and shoot your way through numerous challenging levels. ZF3D is an all new zombie shooting game with excellent graphics, unmissable if you are a fan of thrillers or horror games.
Keep your finger on the trigger as you try to ensure your survival in a virus ravaged world. Upgrade your skills as a survivor and zombie terminator in frontline fighting, enhance your arsenal of weapons, such as sniper guns shotgun and rifles.
Fight for survival through multiple cool game modes. Test your skills in sniper missions and lead survivors to safety in support mission.
Come and experience a truly immersive 3D world and excellent graphics in this zombie action game! The zombie apocalypse may have happened, but that’s no reason to just give up.
Take on the role of a zombie terminator against the undead targets and shoot your way to victory over this zombie purgatory of more than 120 levels. If you’re a FPS and shooting game fan, then ZF3D is your next adventure!
Stunning 3D Graphics
A horde of zombies are upon you. Will you escape or shoot your way out? ZF3 is an amazing, fully realized 3D zombie apocalypse game completed with fantastic undead animations and graphics, it is the next level in smartphone thriller and shooting games.
Awesome Sound & Music
Sounds effects and music will take you into the world of the first person shooter. Feel as if you were there and experiencing a real zombie war.
Numerous different undead targets
Challenge yourself against some of the toughest undead on the frontline battlefield and shoot every targets in the head. A good zombie terminator won’t waste a single bullet.
Innovative Gameplay Mode
Across numerous battlefields, ramp up the action with 5 boss battles, 60 sniper missions, and 2 DLG map, many support levels and regular special events.
Multiple Scenes Design
From urban area to the industrial zone, under the subway or on the tropical islands, even to the latest snowfield are all your battlefield, so easy to become addicted to this adventure!
Cool Arsenal of Weapons
It wouldn’t be a cool shooting game without an impressive arsenal. Choose from more than 30 different guns with which to head into combat. Blast your enemies with an MP5, AK47, Desert Eagle, FN SCAR, HK 416, and many more shotguns and rifles! Let alone various props like adrenaline and grenade. Get your trigger finger ready, the undead must be eliminated.
Weapon Upgrade System
Upgrade weapons in your arsenal, increase their power, range, firing rate and more to take down stronger zombies. You can even equip them with awesome decals! Upgrade your firepower and survive the zombie apocalypse!
Special Events
Take part in special in-game combat and sniper missions to win gold, coins and other prizes!
Take part in the fight to rebuild cities and civilizations following the outbreak of the virus in the latest action packed horror game FPS from FT Games!

comments: I originally gave a 4 star buy now I am dropping the stars to 1. I have the cloud backup and after 1 day of playing everything was erased and I loss all my progress. Why have a cloud save or play the game or spend moo pney when it's erased. I still love the game but now frustrated I will think about uninstalling.

The puzzles are interesting, the animations are generally enjoyable. It quickly becomes a grind, though, where you aren't enjoying the gameplay, you're just trying to get past the timewasters of the daily challenge, or fighting the arbitrary points of the arena. The clan battles and Mighty Eagle challenge are the best parts, but you can't play them all the time. You have to grind away in the Arena.

I just purchased a new phone. And being I'm using the same e-mail address i would have thought it would have started me at the same level I had been on prior to the new phone. Kinda sucks because i had spent a near fortune and was at level 64 ! Unless they can fix this I will remove the game for good. I mean I had every hat except the ones that cost 25,000. Now I'm at zero!

RESUBMITTED: Arena games were sucked up by those high-card players or maybe cheaters. My power cards are the same, just like my opponent, or higher than my opponent's cards. When I slinging those piggies or blocks, it gives me lower points like 4 hundred thousand. But if my opponent slinging them all, it gives higher points like 7.5 million. I lost my winning streaks so I had to play again but it gives me same points so I lost again, sadly. I thought your arena games are really much fun, but they're not.

GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

Classic gameply bogged down by aggravating fremium distration. Havent run into any energy bars yet and already on second world. New birds add interesting gameplay elements but spells are an automatic win that add no semse of achievement besides skipping a hard level. If you want some classic angry birds but dont mind clicking through to get to it then give this a download.
description: Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.SPECTACULAR SPELLS!Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.-----------------------------Discover:https://www.angrybirds.com/Follow:https://www.facebook.com/angrybirdshttps://twitter.com/AngryBirds-----------------------------Angry Birds 2 is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, get ready to rain destruction on those swindling swine!This game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse to any web page- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from third partiesThis game may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. When the game is played for the first time, there is a one-off download of additional content.Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy

It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!

NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!
You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.

SPECTACULAR SPELLS!
Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!

DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!
There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.

-----------------------------

descriptionHTML:
Manage your own Cafe Restaurant and join the cooking game fever. Create a new recipes and stories, travel through different countries and become a world chef.


MANY LEVELS AND HOURS OF FUN
More than 120 levels to complete and new seasons every month!

IMPROVE YOUR MENTAL SPEED
Each level is a challenge for your mind, the number of clients and orders will grow and you will have to attend as quickly as possible.

OPEN COFFEE SHOPS THROUGHOUT THE WORLD
What are you waiting for to invest your money and open another cafe in Japan or France. New recipes and decorations await for you in each country.

IMPROVE YOUR MACHINES
Acquire new machines for your cafeteria, upgrade them and give them maintenance. Ovens, blenders, blenders, coffee mills!

NEW RECIPES AND COMBINATIONS
Learn new recipes and complex combinations. Your clients will pay more for an Unicorn Frappé or Frozen Green Tea!

CUTE DECORATIONS
Add decorations and turn your cafe into a luxurious meeting point to eat a delicious Subways!

IMPROVE YOUR ADMINISTRATOR'S SKILLS
Choose between a girl or a boy to train an expert and prepare the richest coffees, Frappuccinos, Lattes, Cupcakes, Pizzas and Hot cakes. The best starbucks simulator game.

MINIGAMES
Take advantage of the bonus time by dropping coffee drops and collecting tons of prizes!

MONITOR THE WI-FI AREA
Fix the Wi-Fi zone when it fails and prevent people from going mad without paying!

comments: Spaceship on autopilot, to win .  Well, just tap the screen dumbass  I've no control over the ship and all I can do is tap on the screen to make my ship launch missiles.   This game does not go well with arthritis when u have to tap the screen 100 times a minute

What you expect from an idle game. Great time killer. Great customer support. I had an issue, which they addressed almost immediately. They stayed in contact, gave a time that an update should be in place, and even compensated me with a nice sorry for the inconveniences package. Which I wasn't expecting or requesting in anyway. So great game and better customer support than most other mobile developers

Exciting at first, but its easy to lose interest after all the features have been unlocked, with no new ones to aspire for, just the same old things you need to upgrade. Will probably uninstall after a few more runs, but it was fun while it lasted.
Well polished game but heavily reliant on ad revenue so there are too many ads. Way too many. I uninstalled after playing the game for about 20 minutes.

Beware: Some of the ads won't close when they've finished playing, so you've to close the whole game and lose whatever progress you have made so far. Mediocre and repetitive gameplay that is not worth mentioning; have tried better ones.

This game and the others from this developer keep eating up my device storage for some odd reason, even though I've moved them to my SD card. I can't free up that used storage by clearing the cache. It's probably all those video ads it downloads but doesn't save them on the SD card.
description: Upgrade your spaceship, defeat thousands of enemies and challenge powerful bosses on your journey through an endless universe.Join the bounty hunt! Board your starfighter, load up your missiles and start your engines. A new bounty is just around the next solar system. Idle Space is an action packed space bounty hunt where you fight against thousands of heavily armed enemies. Unlock weapons and upgrades and customize your starfighter with dozens of ship parts during your journey through the universe.  Use your devastating special techs to destroy your opponents. Get stronger as you travel through dimensions and upgrade your weapons with dark matter. Beat the ever-growing enemy forces in this exciting idle clicker game. comments: Love the concept of the game but the moment you start reaching higher castle lvl  that's when you realize that if you don't pay you will be on a long journey, ie.. PvP are out of the question everyone has minimum of 5 epic items, arena you will have to settle for 5th or less place due to power lvl difference. I am about 141000 fighting 190000 or 90000, which is not fair for those of low power or advantage to those of high.

Great game. Everything you could want in a game. Castle building, PvP. Unique equipment with special stats. Different attack types, economy classes. Rewards are rewarding enough. So far 5/5. The theme is good. The balance seems reasonable. My only suggestion is making to character limit for name changes bigger for the dwellers/subjects. Only thing I can constructively suggest. Or be able to type first and last name.

After playing for a few hours this I find this game good my only problem is that you need to pay for those epic drops? I mean in a game if you defeated the boss those are supposed to be yours without paying, I can accept paying for 1 dollar but the second boss requires me to purchase it for almost $3 I already paid for premium I don't want to pay for other things. Please make the drops free for premium members or have them cheap or totally free, or else after my premium I'll quit this game.

I loved this game very much, I had a lot of really nice things and invested nearly $60 dollars into making my guys 5 stars and diamonds and other level up promos... I was the clan leader of the "Bananna Kings" my main complaint is my phone rebooted and now I've lost everything... my game, my victories, my clan, and all the money I invested in this great game... please help. ;( my username on my good account is "Skylark"

Loved playing the game, I just wish there was a balance in the PvP Tournaments, can't find a tournament where everyone else isn't 20000 Points over my guys. Please fix this!! Just put a bloody +/-5000 points deviation on it! Make it more enjoyable for people who don't buy everything they see
