description: Defend your house! Your swamp cottage is under attack by animals gone crazy. You have to defend it and survive the oncoming attacks from the evil zombie critters who know no mercy.What's great is that Swamp Attack is free to play, with the option to purchase items to help you progress through the levels faster.Now with an ACTION-PACKED MULTIPLAYER MODE, more than 300 different single-player levels, 8 episodes and Quick Missions for instant action! Defend your house with more than 30 awesome defense tools like the mighty shotgun, the reckless minigun and the super atom bomb! Witness more than 35 different critters going wild - each with its own special attack!HOW TO PLAY- Tap the screen to shoot.- Drag and drop the explosives onto monsters.- Switch between weapons during the action.- Upgrade and equip weapons before starting a new level.- Drink potion to continue playing if you get killed, or to refill the energy instantly.Defend your house and have fun!This app contains:- Promotion of Outfit7's products and contextual advertising- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps- The option to make in-app purchases- The option to invite Facebook friends for in-game rewards- The option to play against other usersTerms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
descriptionHTML:
Defend your house! Your swamp cottage is under attack by animals gone crazy. You have to defend it and survive the oncoming attacks from the evil zombie critters who know no mercy.

What's great is that Swamp Attack is free to play, with the option to purchase items to help you progress through the levels faster.

Now with an ACTION-PACKED MULTIPLAYER MODE, more than 300 different single-player levels, 8 episodes and Quick Missions for instant action! Defend your house with more than 30 awesome defense tools like the mighty shotgun, the reckless minigun and the super atom bomb! Witness more than 35 different critters going wild - each with its own special attack!

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap the screen to shoot.
- Drag and drop the explosives onto monsters.
- Switch between weapons during the action.
- Upgrade and equip weapons before starting a new level.
- Drink potion to continue playing if you get killed, or to refill the energy instantly.

Defend your house and have fun!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and contextual advertising

description: Do you like to participate in the epic battle with brave teammates, fight with opponents and make cool new friends all around the world? Download app with exciting multiplayer and become an assassin in the great world war!The main idea of Crime Revolt appThis shooter was created special for people, who like shooting online in virtual reality just for free. It is a great opportunity to feel like a real soldier with guns and other arms or like a sniper, who tries to prevent a great boom of shotgun. There is a short story – you are in pvp situation, you are making a great shot and your opponent is out of the way. Can you imagine this? You are one of the greatest heroes of Crime Revolt’s world now. Also this shooter has one important feature – every combat, in which you are in, is from first person. What is more, you can play versus gamers worldwide in the 3D FPS. There are a lot of different modern arms, using them you can fight with bad guys in different ways. Direct your fury in the right way. Equipment includes different items like hats, masks, armor and sets. BenefitsCollect coins and experience, use them to upgrade your stuff in modern way and use it in the combat to win. Deal with new challenges every day and get the rewards. Extra opportunities: invisible people, coolest guns and specific shooting. Swat your enemies and become a soldier number one. LocationsHere you have a lot of different maps. We created maps of all sizes for different first person roles in the game: sniper, spy or participant of tank battle. ModesOur free online game offers a lot of different modes for gamers such as Team Deathmatch, Battle with Zombies, Capture the Terrorist’s Points and Sniper Arena. Send to glory dozens of zombies in infection mode. Just run and stop zombie crisis! Portable worldwide connectionIn our new shooter gamers all around the world make new friends because of their connection in one gameplay. It is a global network of people, who like an army of fans of shooting, game strategy and saving the world from bad guys. The main features are:Well-timed updatesAdvantageous offersFirst-person actionExcellent 3d-graphicConnection with like-minded people all around the worldChance to show and upgrade the force and critical thinkingCrime Revolt is portable application. You always have it in your pocket and you always can show your force and fury. Download fun first person shooter now!

comments: Absolutely sublime! This game is so awesome it's exactly what I want in a dragon game! Although there are microtransactions, you can absolutely play this game without spending a cent to progress! I have never ever payed real money to purchase gold, food and all other resources and I've played this game for almost two years The two tips are a little bit of patience and to keep on breeding. Even if you've already bred a certain pair of dragons, selling unwanted eggs is the best and quickest way to make gold

Once you get to level 100, breeding a dragon is almost impossible to nil. Very frustrating. My roommate and I started this game the same time. I am level 115 and she is on 83. We will breed the same dragons at the same time, she will succeed 85% of the time on the first try, it will take me over 10 times if I even get it, this started after level 100. Good luck long term players.

The events are annoying. I have reached the max on collecting eggs. I just gather then from doing tasks. Does that mean I can't participate anymore and am just stuck. I don't understand. Why would you limit the gathering of items?

Have been playing this game for a couple of years now and I love it! Sometimes it's frustrating - especially when you'd need to buy something to be able to get all the prizes during events - but it just makes it more challenging.  VERY happy with the customer support. I had an issue with a gift not being added to my totals, so I emailed them and they fixed it without issue.

The game is definitely addicting. But when I went into the Egg-straordinary Egg hunt island and tapped on a activty, it said their was a wonky spell and it completely stopped the whole game. I've tried different things different times, and it still won't work. I have played this in the past and the same exact thing happened, but with something different.

This game is AWSOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOme. I had 1023 gems saved up and then it glitched and now I only have 34. I love this game so much! Please help me get my 984 gems back! I don't want to rate it lower than 5 stars, but this has happened twice now...😟

comments: Honestly, the game started out being really fun. As players increased their skill level other players (such as myself) who aren't as skilled simply become "cannon fodder". My suggestion is have several skill levels available for those of us who are less than skilled. Additionally, have a respawn area where you not killed before even knowing where you're at.

Definitely pay to win, and expect a huge difference at level 30, when you're placed against all the top level 70s... not that it matters a lot, when you can pay to be maxed with armor and weapon at +40 by level 30, and many are. Other than those points it's a darn fine game, and I've enjoyed many many hours on it... Edit: Game over for me. My best weapon got nerfed to the point of unusable, and with the added "skills" menu the game got way more pay to win. Uninstalling after years of fun. Way to ruin it.

It is good but still once you are level 30 it is much more harder. The player must play with other players with higher ranks with their weapons maximized. It just frustrates me to be killed by a level 50 player with  Fn2000+35 upgrades running around guns blazing with high level armor. All new level 30 players must stick around sniper mode only. But the game is still good... But a bit less enjoyable.

The great pvp fps just needs little update and make it easier to find people with whom we wanna play. and also plz add some new gears and spectator mode to see...  Overall great experience.... Thanx team and plz bring more things in the game...

Worst game ever. Despite paying to play. It's hands down one of the worst game ever. After level 30 it seems impossible to even play a proper game without being killed after spawning. After progressing to level 30, the opponents are all at least 10 levels up with weapons and armor maxed out. Seems impossible to kill the enemies. Only if the teaming was much more fair it would be much more fun. HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED TO SPEND ANY MONEY ON THE GAME

Graphics are average, gameplay is good until you reach level 28. Then it's a complete pay-to-play game. No matter how good you are, you will be trampled by amateurs who've spent a couple hundred on upgrades, guns, armor, etc.   After level 30, matchmaking will put you in battle with people 20 to 30 levels higher, it's despicable.  You can't last 2 seconds exchanging fire with someone after level 28, you've no chance unless you spend a ton of cash.  Way too many bugs as well, hackers can get in very easily, shoot you through walls miles away, become invincible, etc.   Overall, until you even it out, it's one of the worst games out there. Completely unfair gameplay.  Customer service is the worst in the app store. No feedback whatsoever. Game rarely loads. Will not update.

comments: While the overall gameplay is pretty good. The whole game is literally a grind fest. The competitive mode is also messed up as the opponent gets scores near impossible

Everything is great and good but only have one problem. And this problem will killing you all. That's the loading is damn slow no matter you are in LTE network or wifi situation. Because of slow loading it will kill your battery life fast as well. Please help to fix the problem and I will re-rate again. Thanks

Even with a perfect LTE speed game struggled with downloading hunts. The game forces you to do certain hunts before you can go back to the ones you like and want to finish. Not too mention every other minute it forces you to watch an ad or tries to get you to buy something from them. I will be deleting this app once i finish posting this comment.

Awsome game, the only thing wrong with it is that it takes forever to load. The graphics are amazing and so is the gameplay. This is something that could keep me entertained all day and I wouldn't get bored.😺👌

The game currently wont open, when it does its constantly crashing and force stopping. I have the silver subscription ($1.00/weekly) and im unable to take advantage of the content im paying for  want a refund. The upgrades and new equipment are too expensive, the gear and parts are also too expensive and hard to come by especially for the spearfishing which is the best part of the game.. You certainly can't get very far without spending some real money. You can be killed by animals when the come from behind so you with your limited turning capability you have no chance to defend yourself. A lot of problems.
During cts theres moments get sudden lag and it throws off the shooting causing to miss when i know aiming right. It never had these lag bits before.

description: A thrilling ride through jungle, caves and treetops. Play as Kong! Banana Kong!Run, jump, bounce and swing on vines as you help Banana Kong to outrun a huge banana avalanche! Keep full control with highly responsive single-finger tap and swipe controls. Ride the boar or fly with the toucan to overcome dangerous obstacles like massive boulders, crocodiles, piranhas and boiling lava. Nature can be a cruel enemy… While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to outrun your friends! Thanks to full Game Services integration you can see your friends best distance right in the game. Compare your high scores and unlock achievements while improving your playing style. A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this neverending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly.Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles or take alternative routes like the deep underground cave area or treetops. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game. Features: - Cloud Save- HD Display support- Full Game Services integration- Ride animals- One thumb controls- 10 seconds from launching the game to playing it.
descriptionHTML:
A thrilling ride through jungle, caves and treetops.
Play as Kong! Banana Kong!


Run, jump, bounce and swing on vines as you help Banana Kong to outrun a huge banana avalanche! Keep full control with highly responsive single-finger tap and swipe controls.

Ride the boar or fly with the toucan to overcome dangerous obstacles like massive boulders, crocodiles, piranhas and boiling lava. Nature can be a cruel enemy…

While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to outrun your friends! Thanks to full Game Services integration you can see your friends best distance right in the game. Compare your high scores and unlock achievements while improving your playing style.

A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this neverending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly.

Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles or take alternative routes like the deep underground cave area or treetops. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game.


Features:

- Cloud Save
- HD Display support
- Full Game Services integration
- Ride animals
- One thumb controls
- 10 seconds from launching the game to playing it.

comments: This game is a great way to pass time maybe if you're bored and you need something to do or if you're on a road trip it's a great way to stay occupied. I do recommend there be less ads and should not require internet connection.
Very fun. You don't realize how many logos you see per day until you play this game. It's kind of an eye opener!
Haven't been able to put it down! So much fun. Started out as a time killer...snowballed from there really fast :)
Out of all the guess the logo games I've played this one is the best because it has levels that go from easy to hard and I don't need my parents help, I can just use the hints!
Love it... It is a fun game!! It is a great way to pass the time!! But there is only really 1 problem... it takes WIFI. But other than that I love it!😍

Its really fun. I personally like guess the logo games, and this has easy, and challenging logos. It also makes it easier with multiple choice so you don't have as much struggle as you would when you have no idea what the logo  is and you have to type it out.

comments: Game is amazing Love it. Customer service well you have none. All you get is automated message and no way to speak to someone about any issues. You give them what they need and no one fallows up on it. All you get back is the same automated response. Then they remove your ticket. So if you have problems with the game don't bother contacting them it's a waist of your time. THERE'S NO ONE THERE FOR YOU. Can't get my account back. That's all I want. It's simple NO???????

Another month, another violent smash and cash grab. Putting an entire LT behind a character requirement that 99.9% of the player base has next to no chance of getting with obfuscated "odds" that require one to spend 1000s of dollars for a "chance"(not even guaranteed) to get a character. At this point, I'm only updating the game to keep my reviews more relevant and higher weight.

It's a good game. Awesome graphics, great gameplay,amazing superstar etc. But not good for free player because you don't get good superstar and rate of getting better superstar is very very low. Even some time in 4 pulls. I didn't get any 2 star silver card. Please make rare superstar drop rate more or I can't go any further in this game and make this game more free player friendly.

Basically I have been playing this game over the past year... It is a totally addictive and 100% entertaining game... Only downside which has forced me to stop playing is that I have just acquired a new phone and attempted to load the game with my login details (for both Facebook & Google) but have found that I now have to start from the beginning again... I've now become mildly disappointed unless this can be fixed I don't think I will be playing again as I put too much time into this for me to start from the beginning again!!!

It is my favrt game ever when i play this i stuck with this game I want to say something  now it's giving  too many ads and a problem  when I log out it says only one thing again and again that this account using on another device  but it's not real and what I do I am help less and I can't get new powerful superstars 😭😭😭😭😭when I open with cash he always give me duplicates.. Give some new cool events like wrestlemaina T-shirts..

Love playing this game until google services crashed my phone and when I came back on to the game after having to reset everything, I lost access to my account. I have contacted customer services and all they do is send a pregenerated message that answers and resolves nothing!!  5 days and still receiving the same message back.. Even my faction leader has provided information to determine that my account is indeed my account and that I am active in his faction. But still SCOPELY send the same annoying generated message. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICES EVER!!!

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers
Spring into action with this special 50% value-added WWE Champions Acrobat pack to upgrade all of your favorite Acrobat Superstars. Use your Acrobats in the King of Wrestlemania event starting March 23.

Your WWE dream rivalries are happening live in WWE Champions, the free action puzzle RPG game that pits the WWE’s greatest Superstars of all time and today against each other in the ultimate quest for stardom. Collect WWE Superstars from Raw and Smackdown Live alongside your favorite Legends, fighting your way through generations of the greatest WWE Superstars and all out mayhem.

Send your team into a WWE ring to test your fighting skills. Win, and your WWE champions will live on as immortals. Lose, and face defeat at your opponent’s hands. Team up with other WWE fans to battle for reputation, power and bragging rights in WWE Champions! #LetsSettleThis

==WWE CHAMPIONS FEATURES==

WWE Role Playing Game
• Use RPG skills to earn XP by fighting in the ring and upgrading your WWE champions to increase their power and customize epic fighting RPG moves.
• Fighting RPG gameplay lets you combine a variety of skills and upgrades to create a completely unique team to defeat your opponents.

MATCH 3 Game with Signature WWE Moves
• Match 3 pieces and obliterate rivals with signature WWE moves like John Cena’s Attitude Adjustment and The Rock’s legendary Rock Bottom.

WWE Champions and Events
• WWE Champions is always evolving, so join the WWE Universe in weekly bouts and fighting games.
• Re-create upcoming WWE Monday Night RAW and Smackdown battles, enter monthly title events and recruit up-and-coming WWE Superstars.

COLLECT Iconic WWE Superstars
• Collect tons of WWE Superstars and assemble your dream roster of champions from the 80s, 90s and today.
• Collect WWE favorites like The Rock, Undertaker, Macho Man Randy Savage, John Cena, Triple H, Big Show, Andre The Giant and more.

BATTLE in 1-on-1 or Tag Team Online Games
• Match 3 puzzle pieces to attack, build up energy and even pin your enemies using signature WWE moves.
• Battle skillfully to unleash devastation on your rivals in epic battles that you can finish in less than five minutes.
• Online team-ups with friends - tag team against rivals or battle against your friends for ultimate bragging rights.

CREATE the Ultimate Alliance
• Form a super team with your friends to take over the WWE Universe!
• Heal each other's injured Superstars and give gifts to your teammates as you fight for dominance in and out of the ring!

STRATEGIZE with your alliance members in the Faction Headquarters
• Players can coordinate to complete exclusive Expedition missions for rewards, earn faction lockboxes in the Head Office, and earn Faction coins that can be redeemed for valuable items in the Swag Store.


WWE Champions is the ultimate puzzle RPG to feature all of your favorite WWE heroes. Enter the brutal world of the WWE, play puzzle games to defeat your rivals and collect new WWE Superstars to build the ultimate team. Download for free and start battling today!

description: Do you like word search? This letter puzzle game will surprise you. Edujoy’s word search game is easy to play, ideal for hours of fun entertainment while training your brain. It is suitable for both adults and children, resulting in an educational and enriching experience as you play. It has different levels of difficulty, making it perfect for anyone who is on the lookout for words on a board.Easy: Perfect for little kids. The board is 6x6 so it's easy to find the words and solve the puzzle. In addition, the clue system helps you find a new word when the child is stuck.Medium: The board is built 9x9. As you move up in the game the level becomes much more difficult and challenging than the last.Hard: The board is 12x12 and each game is harder. This level is made for players who are looking to test and train their brain with a classic puzzle game.Extreme: Only the bravest may face this level! A difficult feat for those up for the challenge. Do you think you'll be able to beat it?Our app is a classic mental game for all ages. Find the hidden words! 5 levels of difficulty for all ages - easy for children all the way up to extreme for adults.It is also available in several languages, which ​​makes it ideal for learning new vocabulary in other languages. If you are learning: Spanish, English, German, Portuguese, French, Italian, Polish, Turkish… this is the game for you!You will never want to play another word search game and end up referring it to your friends! Every time you play it's a new experience due to our generating system that creates a brand new, random puzzle game. By doing this, it makes it challenging for you every time and allows us to keep you wanting to solve the puzzle. So, you will never get bored!The word search boards are created with many fundamental topics: food, animals, cities, countries, transport, home, colors, sports… Are you ready to solve hundreds of fun-filled puzzles?In addition, the game is integrated with game services making it a social experience with your friends and family. This system allows you to compare your skills and results with others and millions of people around the world. Rankings and achievements included.The classification is based on the time needed to complete a level. So the faster you are, the higher you rank.Through your achievements, you can track your progress and know how you are doing as time passes by. Unlock all the achievements and eventually you'll become the master of puzzles.Thanks to you, It’s very important for us that you share your opinions so we can improve based off the feedback we receive. If you have any questions or suggestions please contact us on our site or through our profiles on social media:Twitter: twitter.com/edujoygamesFacebook: facebook.com/edujoysl
descriptionHTML:
Do you like word search? This letter puzzle game will surprise you. Edujoy’s word search game is easy to play, ideal for hours of fun entertainment while training your brain. It is suitable for both adults and children, resulting in an educational and enriching experience as you play. It has different levels of difficulty, making it perfect for anyone who is on the lookout for words on a board.

Easy: Perfect for little kids. The board is 6x6 so it's easy to find the words and solve the puzzle. In addition, the clue system helps you find a new word when the child is stuck.
Medium: The board is built 9x9. As you move up in the game the level becomes much more difficult and challenging than the last.
Hard: The board is 12x12 and each game is harder. This level is made for players who are looking to test and train their brain with a classic puzzle game.
Extreme: Only the bravest may face this level! A difficult feat for those up for the challenge. Do you think you'll be able to beat it?

Our app is a classic mental game for all ages. Find the hidden words! 5 levels of difficulty for all ages - easy for children all the way up to extreme for adults.
It is also available in several languages, which ​​makes it ideal for learning new vocabulary in other languages. If you are learning: Spanish, English, German, Portuguese, French, Italian, Polish, Turkish… this is the game for you!
You will never want to play another word search game and end up referring it to your friends! Every time you play it's a new experience due to our generating system that creates a brand new, random puzzle game. By doing this, it makes it challenging for you every time and allows us to keep you wanting to solve the puzzle. So, you will never get bored!
The word search boards are created with many fundamental topics: food, animals, cities, countries, transport, home, colors, sports… Are you ready to solve hundreds of fun-filled puzzles?
In addition, the game is integrated with game services making it a social experience with your friends and family. This system allows you to compare your skills and results with others and millions of people around the world. Rankings and achievements included.
The classification is based on the time needed to complete a level. So the faster you are, the higher you rank.
Through your achievements, you can track your progress and know how you are doing as time passes by. Unlock all the achievements and eventually you'll become the master of puzzles.

Thanks to you, It’s very important for us that you share your opinions so we can improve based off the feedback we receive. If you have any questions or suggestions please contact us on our site or through our profiles on social media:

Twitter: twitter.com/edujoygames
Facebook: facebook.com/edujoysl

summary: Word Search in english, spanish and more languages. Mental game for all ages.
title: Word Search Games in english
